16.verse: Mose anati kwa Kora, “Iwe ndi okutsatira onse mudzaonekere pamaso pa Yehova mawa, iweyo ndi iwowo pamodzi ndi Aaroni.

17.verse: Munthu aliyense akatenge chofukizira ndi kuyikamo lubani, zofukizira 250 zonse pamodzi ndi kuzibweretsa pamaso pa Yehova. Iwe ndi Aaroni mudzabweretsenso zofukizira zanu.”

18.verse: Choncho munthu aliyense anatenga chofukizira chake nayikamo moto ndi lubani, ndipo anayima pamodzi ndi Mose ndi Aaroni pa khomo la tenti ya msonkhano.

19.verse: Kora atasonkhanitsa omutsatira ake onse amene amatsutsa nawo pa khomo la tenti ya msonkhano, ulemerero wa Yehova unaonekera kwa gulu lonselo.

20.verse: Yehova anawuza Mose ndi Aaroni kuti,

21.verse: “Chokani pakati pa gulu ili kuti ndithetse mkanganowu kamodzinʼkamodzi.”

22.verse: Koma Mose ndi Aaroni anadzigwetsa chafufumimba ndipo analira mokweza, “Chonde Mulungu, Mulungu wa mizimu ya anthu onse, kodi mudzakwiyira gulu lonse pamene munthu mmodzi yekha ndiye amene wachimwa?”

23.verse: Pamenepo Yehova anawuza Mose kuti,

24.verse: “Uza gulu lonse kuti, ‘Khalani kutali ndi matenti a Kora, Datani ndi Abiramu.’ ”

25.verse: Mose anayimirira napita kwa Datani, Abiramu ndi kwa akuluakulu a Israeli amene ankamutsatira.

26.verse: Anachenjeza gulu lonse kuti, “Khalani kutali ndi matenti a anthu oyipawa! Musakhudze kanthu kawo kalikonse, mukatero mudzawonongedwa limodzi nawo chifukwa cha machimo awo.”

27.verse: Choncho anthuwo anachokadi ku matenti a Kora, Datani ndi Abiramu. Datani ndi Abiramu anali atatuluka nayima pamodzi ndi akazi awo, ana awo ndi makanda awo pa makomo a matenti awo.

28.verse: Tsono Mose anati, “Umu ndi mmene mudzadziwire kuti Yehova ndiye amene anandituma kuti ndichite zinthu zonsezi ndipo kuti si maganizo anga.

29.verse: Ngati anthu awa afa ndi imfa ya chilengedwe ndi kuwachitikira zomwe zimachitikira munthu aliyense, ndiye kuti Yehova sananditume.

30.verse: Koma Yehova akachita china chake chachilendo, nthaka nitsekula pakamwa pake ndi kuwameza iwo pamodzi ndi zonse zimene ali nazo, iwowa nʼkulowa mʼmanda ali moyo, pamenepo mudzazindikira kuti anthu amenewa ananyoza Yehova.”

31.verse: Atangotsiriza kuyankhula zimenezi, nthaka ya pamene anayimapo inagawikana

32.verse: ndipo dziko linatsekula pakamwa pake ndi kuwameza pamodzi ndi nyumba zawo ndi anthu onse a Kora ndi katundu wawo yense.

33.verse: Analowa mʼmanda amoyo pamodzi ndi zonse zimene anali nazo. Nthaka inawatsekera ndi kuwawononga ndipo sanaonekenso.

34.verse: Atamva kulira kwawo, Aisraeli onse amene anali pafupi ndi anthuwo anathawa akufuwula kuti, “Nthaka imezanso ife!”

35.verse: Ndipo moto wochokera kwa Yehova unabwera nʼkunyeketsa anthu 250 amene ankapereka nsembe yofukiza aja.

37.verse: “Uza Eliezara mwana wa Aaroni, wansembe kuti atenge zofukizirazo pakati pa mitembo yopsererayo ndipo amwazire makalawo kutali chifukwa zofukizirazo nʼzopatulika.

38.verse: Izi ndi zofukizira za anthu omwe anafa chifukwa cha uchimo wawo. Musule zofukizirazo kuti zikhale zophimbira pa guwa lansembe, chifukwa zinaperekedwa kwa Yehova ndipo ndi zopatulika. Zimenezi zikhale chizindikiro kwa Aisraeli.”

39.verse: Choncho Eliezara, wansembe, anasonkhanitsa zofukizira zamkuwa zija zomwe anthu opsererawo anabwera nazo ndipo anazisula kuti zikhale zophimbira pa guwa lansembe,

40.verse: monga momwe Yehova anamulangizira kudzera mwa Mose. Chimenechi chinali chikumbutso kwa Aisraeli kuti munthu wina aliyense, kupatula zidzukulu za Aaroni, sayenera kupsereza lubani pamaso pa Yehova, kuopa kuti munthu woteroyo angakhale ngati Kora ndi omutsatira ake.

41.verse: Tsiku lotsatira, gulu lonse la Aisraeli linatsutsana ndi Mose ndi Aaroni. Iwo anati, “Inu mwapha anthu a Yehova.”

42.verse: Koma pamene anthuwo anasonkhana kuti atsutsane ndi Mose ndi Aaroni, atatembenuka kuyangʼana ku tenti ya msonkhano, mwadzidzidzi mtambo unaphimba tentiyo ndipo ulemerero wa Yehova unaonekera.

43.verse: Pamenepo Mose ndi Aaroni anapita patsogolo pa tenti ya msonkhano ija

45.verse: “Chokani pakati pa gulu la anthuwa kuti ndiwawononge kamodzinʼkamodzi.” Ndipo iwo anagwa pansi chafufumimba.

46.verse: Kenaka Mose anawuza Aaroni kuti, “Tenga chofukizira chako ndipo ikamo lubani pamodzi ndi moto wochokera pa guwa lansembe, fulumira, pita pa gulu la anthuwo ndipo ukachite nsembe yopepesera machimo awo popeza mkwiyo wa Yehova wafika, mliri wayamba.”

47.verse: Ndipo Aaroni anachita monga ananenera Mose, nathamangira mʼkatikati mwa gulu la anthuwo. Pamenepo nʼkuti mliri utayamba kale pakati pa anthu aja ndipo Aaroni anafukiza lubani ndi kupereka nsembe yopepesera machimo awo.

48.verse: Iye anayimirira pakati pa anthu amoyo ndi akufa ndipo mliri unaleka.

49.verse: Komabe anthu 14, 700 anafa ndi mliriwo, kuwonjezera pa aja amene anafa chifukwa cha Kora.

50.verse: Ndipo Aaroni anabwerera kwa Mose ku khomo la tenti ya msonkhano, chifukwa mliriwo unali utatha.

1.verse: Kuphukira kwa Ndodo ya Aaroni - Yehova anawuza Mose kuti,

2.verse: “Yankhula ndi Aisraeli ndipo akupatse ndodo khumi ndi ziwiri, imodzi kuchokera kwa mtsogoleri wa fuko lililonse. Ulembe dzina la munthu aliyense pa ndodo yake.

3.verse: Pa ndodo ya Levi ulembepo dzina la Aaroni, chifukwa pafunika ndodo imodzi ya mtsogoleri pa fuko lililonse.

4.verse: Uyike ndodozo mu tenti ya msonkhano, kutsogolo kwa Bokosi la Umboni, kumene ndimakumana nawe.

5.verse: Ndodo ya munthu amene ndamusankha idzachita maluwa potero ndidzaletsa madandawulo osatha a Aisraeli otsutsana nawe.”

6.verse: Choncho Mose anayankhula ndi Aisraeli, ndipo atsogoleri awo anapereka ndodo khumi ndi ziwiri, imodzi kuchokera kwa mtsogoleri wa fuko lililonse ndipo ndodo ya Aaroni inali pakati pa ndodo zawozo.

7.verse: Mose anayika ndodozo pamaso pa Yehova mu tenti ya msonkhano.

8.verse: Pa tsiku lotsatira Mose analowa mu tenti ya msonkhanoyo ndipo anaona kuti ndodo ya Aaroni, yomwe inkayimira fuko la Levi, sinangophuka masamba chabe, komanso inachita maluwa nʼkubala zipatso za alimondi.

9.verse: Choncho Mose anatulutsa ndodo zonse pamaso pa Yehova napita nazo kwa Aisraeli onse. Iwowo anaziona ndipo munthu aliyense anatenga ndodo yake.

10.verse: Yehova anawuza Mose kuti, “Bwezera ndodo ya Aaroni patsogolo pa Bokosi la Umboni, kuti chikhale chizindikiro cha kuwukira kwawo. Zimenezi zidzathetsa kudandaula kwawo kotsutsana nane, kuopa kuti angafe.”

11.verse: Mose anachita monga Yehova anamulamulira.

12.verse: Aisraeli anati kwa Mose, “Tikufa! Tatayika, tonse tatayika!

13.verse: Aliyense woyandikira chihema adzafa. Kodi ndiye kuti tonse tikufa?”

1.verse: Ntchito za Ansembe ndi Alevi - Yehova anawuza Aaroni kuti, “Iwe, ana ako aamuna ndi banja la abambo ako mudzasenza tchimo la malo wopatulika, koma iwe ndi ana ako aamuna okha mudzasenza tchimo lokhudza unsembe wanu.

2.verse: Ubweretse Alevi, abale ako, kuchokera ku fuko la abambo ako kuti azikhala ndi iwe ndi kumakuthandiza pamodzi ndi ana ako amuna pamene mukutumikira mu tenti ya umboni.

3.verse: Iwowo azikutumikirani ndipo azichita ntchito zonse za ku tenti, koma asamafike pafupi ndi zipangizo za ku malo opatulika kapena guwa lansembe, kuopa kuti iwo ndi inu mungafe.

4.verse: Azikhala ndi inu ndipo azisamalira ntchito yonse ya mu tenti ya msonkhano koma munthu wina aliyense wapadera sayenera kufika pafupi nanu.

5.verse: “Inuyo muzisamalira malo wopatulika ndi guwa lansembe, kuti ukali wa Yehova usawagwerenso Aisraeli.

6.verse: Ine mwini ndasankha Alevi, abale ako, pakati pa Aisraeli ngati mphatso yako ndipo aperekedwa kwa Yehova kuti azigwira ntchito ku tenti ya msonkhano.

7.verse: Koma iwe wekha ndi ana ako aamuna muzitumikira ngati ansembe ndi zina zonse zokhudza pa guwa lansembe ndi za mʼkati mwa malo wopatulika kwambiri. Ndikukupatsani mphatso ya utumiki wa unsembe. Aliyense woyandikira malo wopatulika ayenera kuphedwa.

8.verse: Zopereka za Ansembe ndi Alevi - “Kenaka Yehova anati kwa Aaroni, ona, Ine mwini ndikukuyika kuti ukhale woyangʼanira zopereka zobwera kwa Ine; zopereka zonse zopatulika za Aisraeli zimene amapereka kwa ine ndi kuzipereka kwa iwe ndi ana ako aamuna ngati gawo lanu la nthawi zonse.

9.verse: Uzilandiranso gawo la zopereka zopatulika kwambiri zomwe sizinawotchedwe pa moto. Kuchokera pa mphatso zonse zimene amabweretsa kwa Ine ngati zopatulika kwambiri, nsembe zachakudya kapena nsembe zopepesera machimo, gawo limenelo ndi lako ndi ana ako aamuna.

10.verse: Muzidya zimenezo ngati zinthu zopatulika kwambiri; mwamuna aliyense adyeko. Uzitenge kukhala zopatulika.

11.verse: “Izinso ndi zako: chilichonse chopatulidwa kuchokera ku mphatso zoweyula za Aisraeli ndapereka kwa iwe ndi ana ako aamuna ndi aakazi ngati gawo lako la nthawi zonse. Aliyense wa mʼnyumba mwako amene ali woyeretsedwa monga mwa mwambo angathe kudyako.

12.verse: “Ndikukupatsani mafuta onse abwino kwambiri a olivi ndi vinyo yense watsopano wabwino kwambiri ndi tirigu yense zomwe Aisraeli amapereka kwa Yehova ngati zipatso zoyamba pa zokolola zawo.

13.verse: Zipatso zonse zoyamba kucha za mʼdziko lawo zomwe amapereka kwa Yehova zidzakhala zako. Aliyense mʼnyumba mwako amene ali woyeretsedwa angathe kudyako.

14.verse: “Chilichonse mu Israeli chomwe chapatulidwira Yehova ndi chako.

15.verse: Chilichonse choyamba kubadwa kwa munthu kaya nyama, chomwe chaperekedwa kwa Yehova ndi chako. Koma uyenera kuwombola mwana aliyense wamwamuna ndi mwana aliyense woyamba wa nyama zodetsedwa.

16.verse: Pamene zili ndi mwezi umodzi wa kubadwa, uziwombole pa mtengo wowombolera wa ndalama zisanu zasiliva, monga mwa ndalama za ku malo wopatulika.

17.verse: “Koma usawombole ana oyamba kubadwa a ngʼombe, nkhosa kapena mbuzi. Iwo ndi opatulika. Uwaze magazi a nyamazi pa guwa lansembe ndi kutentha mafuta ake ngati nsembe yotentha ndi moto kuti likhale fungo lokoma kwa Yehova.

18.verse: Nyama yake ikhale yanu monga momwe chimakhalira chidale cha nsembe yoweyula ndi ntchafu za miyendo ya kumanja, zonsezi ndi zako.

19.verse: Zonse zimene mwazichotsa ku zopereka zoyera zomwe Aisraeli anapereka kwa Yehova ndazipereka kwa iwe ndi ana ako aamuna ndi aakazi ngati gawo lanu nthawi zonse. Ili ndi pangano losatha la mchere pamaso pa Yehova kwa iwe ndi ana ako.”

20.verse: Ndipo Yehova anati kwa Aaroni, “Iweyo sudzakhala ndi cholowa mʼdziko lawo, ndiponso sudzalandira gawo lililonse pakati pawo. Ine ndine gawo lako ndi cholowa chako pakati pa Aisraeli.

21.verse: “Taonani, ndawapatsa Alevi chakhumi chonse mu Israeli ngati cholowa chawo chifukwa cha ntchito ya ku tenti ya msonkhano.

22.verse: Kuyambira tsopano mpaka mʼtsogolo Aisraeli asamapite pafupi ndi tenti ya msonkhano. Ngati atero adzasenza zotsatira za tchimo lawo ndipo adzafa.

23.verse: Alevi ndi amene azidzagwira ntchito ya ku tenti ya msonkhano ndipo adzalangidwa chilichonse chikalakwika. Ili ndi lamulo losatha kwa mibado yawo yonse. Iwowo sadzalandira cholowa pakati pa Aisraeli.

24.verse: Mʼmalo mwake, ndikuwapatsa Aleviwo chakhumi ngati cholowa chawo chimene Aisraeli amapereka kwa Yehova. Nʼchifukwa chake zokhudza iwo ndinati: ‘Sadzakhala ndi cholowa pakati pa Aisraeli.’ ”

25.verse: Yehova anati kwa Mose,

26.verse: “Yankhula ndi Alevi ndi kunena nawo kuti, ‘Pamene mulandira chakhumi kuchoka kwa Aisraeli chimene ndimakupatsani ngati cholowa chanu, muyenera kupereka chakhumi cha choperekacho kwa Yehova.

27.verse: Chopereka chanucho chidzawerengedwa kwa inu ngati tirigu wochokera kopunthira kapena ngati mphesa zopsinya kuchokera kopsinyira mphesa.

28.verse: Mwa njira imeneyi inunso muzipereka chopereka kwa Yehova kuchokera ku chakhumi chanu chilichonse chimene mumalandira kuchokera kwa Aisraeli. Kuchokera ku chakhumicho muziperekako gawo la Yehova kwa Aaroni, wansembe.

29.verse: Muyenera kupereka monga gawo la Yehova magawo abwino kwambiri ndi opatulika a chilichonse chimene chapatsidwa kwa inu.’

30.verse: “Nena kwa Alevi: ‘Pamene mupereka gawo labwino lopambana zonse, gawo limenelo lidzawerengedwa kwa inu ngati lochokera popunthira tirigu kapenanso kopsinyira mphesa.

31.verse: Inu ndi a pa banja panu mungathe kudyera zimenezi paliponse chifukwa ndi malipiro a ntchito yanu ya ku tenti ya msonkhano.

32.verse: Popereka gawo labwino kwambirilo simudzapezeka olakwa. Mukatero simudzadetsa zopereka zoyera za Aisraeli, ndipo simudzafa.’ ”

1.verse: Phulusa ndi Madzi Oyeretsera - Yehova anati kwa Mose ndi Aaroni:

2.verse: “Lamulo limene Yehova wapereka ndi ili: Uzani Aisraeli kuti abweretse ngʼombe yayikazi yofiira yopanda chilema chilichonse imenenso sinakhalepo pa goli.

3.verse: Muyipereke kwa Eliezara, wansembe ndipo apite nayo kunja kwa msasa. Iphedwe iye ali pomwepo.

4.verse: Ndipo Eliezara wansembe atengeko ena mwa magazi a ngʼombeyo ndi chala chake ndi kuwaza kasanu nʼkawiri ku tsogolo kwa tenti ya msonkhano.

5.verse: Wansembeyo akuona, ngʼombeyo ayiwotche chikopa chake, mnofu wake, magazi ake ndi zamʼkati zake.

6.verse: Wansembe atenge mtengo wamkungudza, hisope ndi kansalu kofiira ndipo aponye zimenezo pakati pa moto umene akuwotchera ngʼombeyo.

7.verse: Zitatha izi, wansembeyo ayenera kuchapa zovala zake ndiponso asambe ndi madzi. Iye angathe kupita ku msasa, komabe adzakhala wodetsedwa mpaka madzulo.

8.verse: Munthu amene amawotcha ngʼombeyo ayeneranso kuchapa zovala zake ndi kusamba ndi madzi. Iyenso adzakhala wodetsedwa mpaka madzulo.

9.verse: “Munthu amene ndi woyeretsedwa achotse phulusa la ngʼombeyo ndi kuliyika pa malo woyeretsedwa kunja kwa msasa. Aisraeli adzasunge phulusalo kuti azikaligwiritsa ntchito polithira mʼmadzi woyeretsera ndi wochotsera tchimo.

10.verse: Munthu wochotsa phulusa la ngʼombeyo ayeneranso kuchapa zovala zake. Iyenso adzakhala wodetsedwa mpaka madzulo. Ili likhale lamulo la nthawi zonse kwa Aisraeli ndi alendo okhala pakati pawo.

11.verse: “Aliyense wokhudza mtembo wa munthu wina aliyense adzakhala wodetsedwa masiku asanu ndi awiri.

12.verse: Adziyeretse yekha ndi madzi pa tsiku lachitatu ndi pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri ndipo adzayeretsedwa. Koma ngati sadziyeretsa yekha pa tsiku la chitatu ndi lachisanu ndi chiwiri sadzakhala woyeretsedwa.

13.verse: Aliyense amene akhudza mtembo wa munthu nʼkulephera kudziyeretsa yekha, ndiye kuti wadetsa Nyumba ya Yehova. Munthu ameneyo achotsedwe pakati pa Aisraeli. Iye ndi wodetsedwa chifukwa sanamuwaze madzi oyeretsa; kudetsedwa kwake kukhalabe pa iyeyo.

14.verse: “Pamene munthu wamwalira mu tenti, lamulo lomwe ligwire ntchito ndi ili: Aliyense wolowa mu tentimo ndi amene anali momwemo adzakhala odetsedwa kwa masiku asanu ndi awiri,

15.verse: ndiponso chiwiya chilichonse chopanda chivundikiro chidzakhala chodetsedwa.

16.verse: “Aliyense wokhudza munthu amene waphedwera kunja ndi lupanga kapena amene wafa ndi imfa ya chilengedwe, kapena aliyense wokhudza fupa la munthu kapena manda, munthu ameneyo adzakhala wodetsedwa kwa masiku asanu ndi awiri.

17.verse: “Za munthu wodetsedwayo: ikani phulusa lochokera ku nsembe ya chiyeretso mu mtsuko ndi kuthiramo madzi abwino.

18.verse: Tsono munthu woyeretsedwa atenge hisope, amuviyike mʼmadzi ndi kuwaza tentiyo ndi zipangizo zonse, pamodzi ndi anthu anali mʼmenemo. Ayenera kuwazanso aliyense wakhudza fupa kapena, munthu wochita kuphedwa, kapena amene wafa ndi imfa ya chilengedwe kapenanso amene wakhudza manda.

19.verse: Munthu woyeretsedwa ndiye awaze munthu wodetsedwayo pa tsiku lachitatu ndi pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri, ndipo pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri amuyeretse. Munthu amene akuyeretsedwayo ayenera kuchapa zovala zake ndi kusamba ndi madzi, ndipo madzulo ake adzakhala woyeretsedwa.

20.verse: Koma ngati munthu wodetsedwayo sadziyeretsa yekha, ndiye kuti ayenera kuchotsedwa pakati pa gulu chifukwa anadetsa malo wopatulika a Yehova, popeza sanawazidwe madzi oyeretsa ndiye kuti ndi wodetsedwa.

21.verse: Ili ndi lamulo lokhazikika kwa iwo. “Munthu amene amawaza madzi oyeretsawo ayenera kuchapa zovala zake ndipo yense wokhudza madzi oyeretserawo adzakhala wodetsedwa mpaka madzulo.

22.verse: Chilichonse chimene munthu wodetsedwayo achikhudze chidzakhala chodetsedwa ndiponso aliyense wochikhudza adzakhala wodetsedwa mpaka madzulo.”

1.verse: Madzi Ochokera Mʼthanthwe - Pa mwezi woyamba gulu lonse la Aisraeli linafika ku chipululu cha Zini, ndipo anakhala ku Kadesi. Miriamu anafera kumeneko ndipo anayikidwa mʼmanda.

2.verse: Kunalibe madzi woti anthu onse ndi kumwa, choncho anthuwo anasonkhana motsutsana ndi Mose ndi Aaroni.

3.verse: Anakangana ndi Mose kuti, “Kunali bwino ifenso tikanangofa pamene abale athu anafa pamaso pa Yehova!

4.verse: Chifukwa chiyani unabweretsa gulu la Yehova mʼchipululu muno, kuti ife ndi ziweto zathu tife kuno?

5.verse: Nʼchifukwa chiyani unatitulutsa mʼdziko la Igupto ndi kutibweretsa kumalo woyipa ano? Kuno kulibe tirigu kapena nkhuyu, mphesa kapena makangadza. Ndipo kuno kulibenso madzi akumwa!”

6.verse: Mose ndi Aaroni anachoka mu msonkhano ndi kupita pa khomo la tenti ya msonkhano, nagwa pansi chafufumimba ndipo ulemerero wa Yehova unaonekera.

7.verse: Yehova anati kwa Mose,

8.verse: “Tenga ndodo, ndipo iwe ndi mʼbale wako Aaroni musonkhanitse anthu onse pamodzi. Uyankhule ndi thanthwe ilo iwo akuona ndipo lidzatulutsa madzi ake. Udzatulutsa madzi mʼthanthwe limeneli kuti anthu onse ndi ziweto zawo amwe.”

9.verse: Choncho Mose anatenga ndodo pamaso pa Yehova monga momwe anamulamulira.

10.verse: Mose ndi Aaroni anasonkhanitsa anthuwo pamodzi ku thanthwelo ndipo Mose anawawuza kuti, “Tamverani osamvera inu, kodi tikupatseni madzi kuchokera ku thanthwe ili?”

11.verse: Choncho Mose anatukula dzanja lake ndi kumenya thanthwelo kawiri ndi ndodo yake ndipo madzi ambiri anatuluka mwamphamvu, ndipo anthu ndi ziweto zawo anamwa.

12.verse: Koma Yehova anati kwa Mose ndi Aaroni, “Chifukwa chakuti simunandikhulupirire ndiponso simunandilemekeze monga Woyera pamaso pa Aisraeli, simudzalowetsa anthuwa mʼdziko limene ndikupereka kwa iwo.”

13.verse: Awa anali madzi a ku Meriba, kumene Aisraeli anakangana ndi Yehova ndiponso kumene Yehovayo anadzionetsa yekha kuti ndi Woyera pakati pawo.

14.verse: Aedomu Akaniza Njira Aisraeli - Mose anatumiza amithenga kuchokera ku Kadesi kupita kwa mfumu ya ku Edomu, kukanena kuti, “Mʼbale wako Israeli akunena izi: Inuyo mukudziwa za mavuto onse amene anatigwera.

15.verse: Makolo athu anapita ku Igupto ndipo tinakhala kumeneko zaka zambiri. Aigupto anatizunza pamodzi ndi makolo athuwo,

16.verse: koma titalirira Yehova, Iyeyo anamva kulira kwathuko ndipo anatitumizira mngelo amene anatitulutsa ku Igupto.” “Taonani, tsopano tili pano pa Kadesi, mzinda wa mʼmalire a dziko lanu.

17.verse: Chonde mutilole tidutse mʼdziko lanu. Sitidzera mʼminda yanu kapena mu mpesa wanu, kapenanso kumwa madzi mʼchitsime chilichonse. Tidzayenda kutsata msewu waukulu wa mfumu ndipo sitidzapatukira ku dzanja lamanja kapena lamanzere mpaka titadutsa malire a dziko lanu.”

18.verse: Koma Edomu anayankha kuti, “Musadutse kuno: Mukangoyesera tidzabwera ndi kumenyana nanu ndi lupanga.”

19.verse: Aisraeli anayankha kuti, “Tidzayenda motsata msewu waukulu. Ndipo ngati ife kapena ziweto zathu tidzamwa madzi anu tidzalipira. Tikungofuna tidutse nawo, palibenso china.”

20.verse: Koma Edomu anayankhanso kuti, “Musadutse.” Kenaka Edomu anatuluka ndi gulu lankhondo lalikulu komanso lamphamvu.

21.verse: Edomu anakaniza Israeli kuti adutse mʼdziko lake, choncho Israeli anabwerera.

22.verse: Aaroni Amwalira - Gulu lonse la Aisraeli linachoka ku Kadesi ndipo linafika ku phiri la Hori.

23.verse: Ali pa phiri la Hori, pafupi ndi malire a Edomu, Yehova anati kwa Mose ndi Aaroni,

24.verse: “Aaroni adzakakhala ndi anthu a mtundu wake, sadzalowa mʼdziko limene ndapereka kwa Aisraeli, chifukwa nonse munandiwukira motsutsana ndi malamulo anga ku madzi a ku Meriba.

25.verse: Tenga Aaroni ndi mwana wake wamwamuna Eliezara ndipo ukwere nawo ku phiri la Hori.

26.verse: Uvule Aaroni zovala zake ndipo umuveke mwana wake Eliezara, pakuti Aaroni adzafera komweko, ndipo adzakakhala ndi anthu a mtundu wake.”

27.verse: Mose anachita monga Yehova anamulamulira: Anapita ku phiri la Hori gulu lonse likuona.

28.verse: Pamenepo Mose anavula Aaroni zovala zake ndi kuveka mwana wake Eliezara. Aaroni anafa kumeneko pamwamba pa phirilo. Koma Mose ndi Eliezara anatsika ku phiriko,

29.verse: ndipo pamene anthu onse anamva kuti Aaroni wafa, nyumba yonse ya Israeli inamulira Aaroniyo masiku makumi atatu.

1.verse: Kuwonongedwa kwa Aradi - Mfumu ya Akanaani ya ku Aradi, imene inkakhala ku Negevi, itamva kuti Aisraeli akubwera kudzera msewu wopita ku Atarimu, inachita nkhondo ndi Aisraeli nigwira ena mwa iwo.

2.verse: Ndipo Israeli anachita lonjezo ili kwa Yehova: “Mukapereka anthu awa mʼdzanja lathu ife tidzawonongeratu mizinda yawo.”

3.verse: Yehova anamva pempho la Aisraeli ndipo anapereka Akanaaniwo kwa iwo. Anawawononga pamodzi ndi mizinda yawo. Kotero malowo anatchedwa Horima.

4.verse: Njoka Yamkuwa - Aisraeli anayenda kuchokera ku phiri la Hori kudzera njira ya ku Nyanja Yofiira kuzungulira dziko la Edomu. Koma anthu anataya mtima mʼnjiramo

5.verse: ndipo anayankhula motsutsana ndi Mulungu ndi Mose, nati, “Chifukwa chiyani munatitulutsa kuchoka mʼdziko la Igupto kuti tidzafere mʼchipululu muno? Kuno kulibe chakudya, kulibe madzi ndipo chakudya cha chabechabechi tatopa nacho.”

6.verse: Choncho Yehova anatumiza njoka zaululu pakati pawo. Zinaluma anthu ndipo Aisraeli ambiri anafa.

7.verse: Anthuwo anabwera kwa Mose ndi kunena kuti, “Tachimwa chifukwa tayankhula motsutsana ndi Yehova komanso inu. Pempherani kwa Yehova kuti atichotsere njokazi.” Tsono Mose anapempherera anthuwo.

8.verse: Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Upange njoka yaululu ndipo uyipachike pa mtengo. Aliyense amene walumidwa akangoyangʼana njokayo adzakhala ndi moyo.”

9.verse: Pamenepo Mose anapanga njoka yamkuwa ndi kuyipachika pa mtengo. Ndipo aliyense wolumidwa akayangʼana njoka yamkuwayo ankakhala ndi moyo.

10.verse: Ulendo wa ku Mowabu - Aisraeli anayendabe nakamanga misasa yawo ku Oboti.

11.verse: Kenaka anasamuka ku Oboti nakamanga misasa yawo ku Iye-Abarimu, mʼchipululu chimene chili kummawa kwa Mowabu, kotulukira dzuwa.

12.verse: Kuchoka kumeneko anayendabe nakamanga misasa yawo mʼchigwa cha Zeredi.

13.verse: Anasamukanso kumeneko nakamanga moyandikana ndi Arinoni mʼdera limene lili mʼchipululu chimene chimafika mʼdziko la Aamori. Arinoni ndiwo malire a Mowabu ndi Aamori.

14.verse: Nʼchifukwa chake Buku la Nkhondo za Yehova limati, “Mzinda wa Wahebu uli mu Sufa, mu zigwa za Arinoni,

15.verse: ku matsitso a zigwa amene afika mpaka ku Ari nakhudza malire a dziko la Mowabu.”

16.verse: Kuchokera kumeneko anapitirira mpaka ku Beeri, pa chitsime chomwe Yehova anawuza Mose kuti, “Sonkhanitsa anthu pamodzi ndipo ndidzawapatsa madzi.”

17.verse: Pamenepo Aisraeli anayimba nyimbo iyi: “Tulutsa madzi, chitsime iwe! Chiyimbireni nyimbo,

18.verse: chitsime chomwe anakumba mafumu, chomwe anakumba anthu omveka, ndi ndodo zawo zaufumu ndi ndodo zawo zoyendera.” Kenaka anachoka ku chipululu ndi kupita ku Matana.

19.verse: Kuchoka ku Matana anapita ku Nahalieli, kuchoka ku Nahalieli anapita ku Bamoti,

20.verse: ndipo atachoka ku Bamoti anapita ku chigwa cha dziko la Mowabu kudzera njira ya pamwamba pa phiri la Pisiga, moyangʼanana ndi Yesimoni.

21.verse: Kugonjetsedwa kwa Sihoni ndi Ogi - Aisraeli anatumiza amithenga kwa Sihoni mfumu ya Aamori, kuti,

22.verse: “Tiloleni kuti tidutse mʼdziko mwanu. Sitidzapatukira mʼminda mwanu kapena mu mpesa wanu kapena kumwa madzi mʼchitsime chili chonse. Tidzayenda mu msewu waukulu wa mfumu mpaka titadutsa malire a dziko lanu.”

23.verse: Koma Sihoni sanalole kuti Aisraeli adutse mʼdziko mwake. Iye anasonkhanitsa pamodzi ankhondo ake onse kuti akamenyane ndi Aisraeli mʼchipululu. Atafika pa Yahazi anamenyana ndi Aisraeli.

24.verse: Koma Aisraeli anamupha ndi kulanda dziko lake kuchokera ku Arinoni mpaka ku Yaboki, kulekezera mʼmalire a dziko la Aamoni, chifukwa malire a dziko la Aamoni anali otetezedwa.

25.verse: Ndipo Aisraeli analanda mizinda yonse ya Aamori, nakhalamo kuphatikizapo Hesiboni ndi midzi yake yozungulira.

26.verse: Hesiboni unali mzinda wa Sihoni mfumu ya Aamori, yemwe anamenyana ndi mfumu yakale ya dziko la Mowabu. Lonselo linakhala dziko lake mpaka ku Arinoni.

27.verse: Nʼchifukwa chake alakatuli amati: “Bwerani ku Hesiboni, mzindawo umangidwenso; mzinda wa Sihoni ukhazikike.

28.verse: “Moto unabuka ku Hesiboni, malawi a moto kuchokera mu mzinda wa Sihoni. Unanyeketsa Ari mzinda wa ku Mowabu, nzika za ku malo okwera a Arinoni.

29.verse: Tsoka kwa iwe Mowabu! Mwawonongedwa inu anthu a ku Kemosi! Ana ake aamuna wawasandutsa ngati anthu othawathawa ndipo ana ake aakazi ngati akapolo, akapolo a Sihoni, mfumu ya Aamori.

30.verse: “Koma ife tawagonjetsa; Hesiboni wawonongedwa mʼnjira monse mpaka kufika ku Diboni. Tawaphwasula mpaka ku mzinda wa Nofa, mzinda womwe umafika ku Medeba.

31.verse: “Choncho Aisraeli anakhala mʼdziko la Aamori.”

32.verse: Mose atatumiza azondi ku Yazeri, Aisraeliwo analanda midzi yozungulira ndi kuthamangitsa Aamori omwe ankakhala kumeneko.

33.verse: Kenaka anabwerera, nadzera njira ya ku Basani. Choncho Ogi mfumu ya ku Basani ndi gulu lake lonse lankhondo anatuluka kukakumana nawo ndipo anamenyana nawo ku Ederi.

34.verse: Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Usachite naye mantha pakuti ndamupereka mʼmanja mwako pamodzi ndi gulu lake lonse lankhondo ndi dziko lake lomwe. Ndipo uchite kwa iye zimene unachita Sihoni mfumu ya Aamori, amene ankalamulira ku Hesiboni.”

35.verse: Choncho Aisraeli anapha Ogi pamodzi ndi ana ake aamuna ndi gulu lake lonse la nkhondo. Palibe ndi mmodzi yemwe amene anatsala wamoyo, ndipo analanda dziko lakelo.

1.verse: Balaki Ayitana Balaamu - Aisraeli anayenda kupita ku zigwa za Mowabu nakamanga misasa yawo tsidya lina la Yorodani moyangʼanana ndi Yeriko.

2.verse: Tsono Balaki mwana wa Zipori anaona zonse zimene Aisraeli anachitira Aamori,

3.verse: ndipo Amowabu anaopa anthuwo chifukwa analipo ambiri. Amowabuwo anachita mantha kwambiri mpaka ananjenjemera chifukwa cha Aisraeli.

4.verse: Iwo anati kwa akuluakulu a ku Midiyani, “Gulu ili lidzabudula zonse zimene zatizungulira monga momwe ngʼombe yothena imathera udzu wa ku tchire.” Tsono Balaki mwana wa Zipori, yemwe anali mfumu ya Mowabu pa nthawi imeneyo,

5.verse: anatumiza amithenga kwa Balaamu mwana wa Beori, yemwe anali ku Petori, pafupi ndi mtsinje, mʼdziko la kwawo kuti akamuyitane. Balaki anati: “Taonani, anthu ochokera ku Igupto abwera, adzaza dziko lonse ndipo akufuna kuchita nane nkhondo.

6.verse: Tsopano bwera, utemberere anthu amenewa chifukwa ndi amphamvu kwambiri kuposa ine. Mwina ndingadzawagonjetse ndi kuwatulutsira kunja kwa dzikoli chifukwa ndikudziwa kuti amene umawadalitsa amadalitsika, ndipo amene umawatemberera amatembereredwa.”

7.verse: Akuluakulu a Mowabu ndi akuluakulu a Midiyani ananyamuka atatenga ndalama zokalipirira mawula. Atafika kwa Balaamu, anamuwuza zomwe Balaki ananena.

8.verse: Balaamu anawawuza kuti, “Mugone konkuno usiku uno, ndipo ndikuyankhani zomwe Yehova andiwuze.” Choncho akuluakulu a Amowabu anagona kwa Balaamu.

9.verse: Mulungu anabwera kwa Balaamu namufunsa kuti, “Kodi anthu ali ndi iwewa ndani?”

10.verse: Balaamu anayankha Mulungu kuti, “Balaki mwana wa Zipori, mfumu ya Mowabu, ananditumizira uthenga uwu:

11.verse: ‘Taonani, anthu amene achokera ku dziko la Igupto adzaza dziko lonse. Tsopano bwera udzawatemberere mʼmalo mwanga. Mwina ndidzatha kumenyana nawo ndi kuwatulutsa.’ ”

12.verse: Koma Mulungu anawuza Balaamu kuti, “Usapite nawo. Usawatemberere anthu amenewo chifukwa ndi odalitsika.”

13.verse: Mmawa mwake Balaamu anadzuka ndi kuwuza akuluakulu a Balaki aja kuti, “Bwererani ku dziko la kwanu chifukwa Yehova sanandilole kuti ndipite nanu.”

14.verse: Kotero akuluakulu a Mowabu anabwerera kwa Balaki ndi kukanena kuti, “Balaamu wakana kubwera nafe.”

15.verse: Kenaka Balaki anatumanso akuluakulu ena ambiri ndi olemekezeka kwambiri kuposa oyamba aja ndipo

16.verse: anafika kwa Balaamu nati; “Zomwe Balaki mwana wa Zipori akunena ndi izi: ‘Usalole kuti china chilichonse chikulepheretse kubwera kwa ine,

17.verse: chifukwa ndidzakulipira bwino kwambiri ndipo ndidzakuchitira chilichonse chimene unganene. Bwera ndipo uwatemberere anthu amenewa mʼmalo mwanga.’ ”

18.verse: Koma Balaamu anayankha atumiki a Balaki kuti, “Ngakhale Balaki atandipatsa nyumba yaufumu yodzaza ndi siliva ndi golide sindingachite chilichonse chachikulu kapena chachingʼono kuposa kuchita lamulo la Yehova Mulungu wanga.

19.verse: Tsopano mukhale kuno usiku uno monga ena anachitira, ndidzaona chimene Yehova adzandiwuza.”

20.verse: Usiku umenewo Mulungu anabwera kwa Balaamu ndipo anati, “Popeza anthu awa abwera kudzakuyitana, nyamuka, pita nawo koma ukachite zokhazo zimene ndikuwuze.”

21.verse: Bulu Ayankhula - Balaamu anadzuka mmawa, namanga bulu wake wamkazi ndipo anapita ndi akuluakulu a Mowabu.

22.verse: Koma Mulungu anakwiya kwambiri pamene ankapita ndipo mngelo wa Yehova anayima pa njira kutsutsana naye. Balaamu anakwera bulu wake wamkazi ndipo antchito ake awiri anali naye.

23.verse: Pamene buluyo anaona mngelo wa Yehova atayima pa njira ndi lupanga mʼmanja mwake, anapatukira kumbali kwa msewu napita kutchire. Balaamu anamumenya kuti abwerere mu msewu.

24.verse: Kenaka mngelo wa Yehova anayima mʼkanjira kakangʼono pakati pa minda iwiri ya mpesa yokhala ndi makoma mbali zonse

25.verse: Bulu uja ataona mngelo wa Yehova anadzipanikiza ku khoma, kukhukhuza phazi la Balaamu kukhomako. Ndipo pomwepo Balaamu anamenya buluyo kachiwiri.

26.verse: Kenaka mngelo wa Yehova anapita patsogolo ndi kuyima pamalo opanikizika pomwe panalibe poti nʼkutembenukira ku dzanja lamanja kapena lamanzere.

27.verse: Buluyo ataonanso mngelo wa Yehova uja, anagona pansi Balaamu ali pa msana, ndipo iye anakwiya ndi kumumenya ndi ndodo yake.

28.verse: Pamenepo Yehova anayankhulitsa bulu uja, ndipo buluyo anati kwa Balaamu, “Ndakuchitirani chiyani kuti mundimenye katatuka?”

29.verse: Balaamu anati kwa buluyo, “Wandipusitsa, ndikanakhala ndi lupanga mʼmanja mwanga, ndikanakupha pomwe pano.”

30.verse: Buluyo anati kwa Balaamu, “Kodi sindine bulu wanu, amene mumakwera nthawi zonse kufikira lero? Kodi ndinakuchitiranipo zoterezi?” Iye anati “Ayi.”

31.verse: Pomwepo Yehova anatsekula maso Balaamu ndipo anaona mngelo wa Yehovayo ali chiyimire pa njira ndi lupanga losolola. Tsono iye anawerama nalambira pamaso pake.

32.verse: Mngelo wa Yehova anamufunsa kuti, “Chifukwa chiyani wamenya bulu wako katatu? Taona, Ine ndabwera kudzakutsutsa chifukwa ulendo wakowu ndi woyipa pamaso panga.

33.verse: Buluyu anandiona ndi kupatuka katatu aka. Akanakhala kuti sanapatuke, ndikanakupha tsopano, koma buluyu nʼkanamusiya ndi moyo.”

34.verse: Balaamu anati kwa mngelo wa Yehova uja, “Ndachimwa. Sindinadziwe kuti munayima pa njira kunditsutsa. Tsopano ngati Inu simunakondwe, ineyo ndibwerera.”

35.verse: Mngelo wa Yehova anati kwa Balaamu, “Pita ndi anthuwa koma ukayankhule zokhazo zimene ndikakuwuze.” Choncho Balaamu anapita ndi akuluakulu a Balaki.

36.verse: Balaki atamva kuti Balaamu akubwera, anapita kukakumana naye ku mzinda wa Mowabu umene unali mʼmalire a Arinoni, mʼmphepete mwa dziko lake.

37.verse: Balaki anati kwa Balaamu, “Kodi sindinakutumizire uthenga woti ubwere msanga? Chifukwa chiyani sunabwere kwa ine? Kodi sindingathe kukulipira mokwanira?”

38.verse: Balaamu anayankha Balaki kuti, “Taonani, ndabwera kwa inu lero, kodi ine ndili ndi mphamvu zoti nʼkuyankhula chilichonse? Inetu ndiyenera kuyankhula zokhazo zimene Mulungu wandiwuza.”

39.verse: Pamenepo Balaamu anapita pamodzi ndi Balaki ku Kiriati-Huzoti.

40.verse: Balaki anapereka nsembe ngʼombe ndi nkhosa, ndipo anapereka zina kwa Balaamu ndi kwa akuluakulu omwe anali naye.

41.verse: Mmawa mwake Balaki anatenga Balaamu napita limodzi ku Bamoti Baala, ndipo kumeneko anakaonako gulu lina la Aisraeliwo.

1.verse: Uthenga Woyamba wa Balaamu - Balaamu anati kwa Balaki, “Mundimangire maguwa ansembe asanu ndi awiri pano, ndipo mukonzenso ngʼombe zazimuna zisanu ndi ziwiri ndi nkhosa zazimuna zisanu ndi ziwiri.”

2.verse: Balaki anachita monga Balaamu ananenera ndipo awiriwo anapereka ngʼombe imodzi ndi nkhosa yayimuna imodzi pa guwa lansembe lililonse.

3.verse: Kenaka Balaamu anati kwa Balaki, “Khalani pano pafupi ndi nsembe yanu ineyo ndipite pambali. Mwina Yehova adzabwera kuti akumane nane. Chilichonse chimene akandionetse ndidzakuwuzani” Choncho anapita ku malo okwera a chipululu.

4.verse: Mulungu anakumana naye ndipo Balaamu anati, “Ndakonza maguwa asanu ndi awiri ndipo pa guwa lililonse ndaperekapo nsembe ya ngʼombe yayimuna imodzi ndi nkhosa yayimuna imodzinso.”

5.verse: Yehova anawuza Balaamu kuti, “Bwerera kwa Balaki ndipo ukamuwuze uthenga uwu.”

6.verse: Ndipo anabwerera kwa iye namupeza atayima pafupi ndi nsembe yake pamodzi ndi akuluakulu onse a Mowabu.

7.verse: Ndipo Balaamu ananena uthenga wake: “Balaki ananditenga kuchoka ku Aramu, mfumu ya ku Mowabu kuchokera ku mapiri a kummawa. Iye anati, ‘Bwera, temberera Yakobo mʼmalo mwanga, pita nyoza Israeli.’

8.verse: Ndingatemberere bwanji amene Mulungu sanawatemberere? Ndinganyoze bwanji amene Yehova sanawanyoze?

9.verse: Kuchokera pamwamba pa mapiri ndikuona anthu, ndikuwaona kuchokera pa zitunda. Ndikuona anthu okhala pawokha, osakhala mʼgulu limodzi ndi mitundu ina.

10.verse: Ndani angawerenge zidzukulu za Yakobo zochuluka ngati fumbi, kapena chimodzi mwa zigawo zinayi za Israeli? Lekeni ndife imfa ya oyera mtima, ndi chimaliziro changa chikhale ngati chawo!”

11.verse: Balaki anati kwa Balaamu, “Wandichitira chiyani? Ndinakuyitana kuti utemberere adani anga, ndipo taona, sunachite chilichonse koma kuwadalitsa!”

12.verse: Iye anayankha kuti, “Kodi sindinayenera kuyankhula zimene Yehova anandiwuza?”

13.verse: Uthenga Wachiwiri wa Balaamu - Kenaka Balaki anawuza Balaamu kuti, “Tiye tipite limodzi ku malo ena komwe ungawaone. Udzangoona gulu limodzi osati onsewo. Ndipo pamenepo, ukawatemberere mʼmalo mwanga.”

14.verse: Tsono anamutengera ku munda wa Zofimu pamwamba pa phiri la Pisiga ndipo kumeneko anamanga maguwa ansembe asanu ndi awiri ndipo anapereka nsembe ngʼombe yayimuna imodzi ndi nkhosa yayimuna imodzi pa guwa lansembe lililonse.

15.verse: Balaamu anawuza Balaki kuti, “Khalani pano pafupi ndi nsembe yanu pamene ine ndikukakumana ndi Mulungu cha uko.”

16.verse: Yehova anakumana ndi Balaamu ndipo anamuyankhula kuti, “Bwerera kwa Balaki ndipo ukamuwuze uthenga uwu.”

17.verse: Ndipo anapita kwa iye ndipo anamupeza atayimirira pafupi ndi nsembe yake pamodzi ndi akuluakulu a ku Mowabu. Balaki anafunsa Balaamu kuti, “Yehova wayankhula chiyani?”

18.verse: Pamenepo Balaamu ananena uthenga wake: “Nyamuka Balaki ndipo tamvera; Undimvere iwe mwana wa Zipori.

19.verse: Mulungu si munthu kuti aname, kapena mwana wa munthu kuti asinthe maganizo ake. Kodi amayankhula koma osachita? Kodi amalonjeza koma osakwaniritsa?

20.verse: Wandilamula kuti ndidalitse, Iyeyo wadalitsa ndipo sindingasinthe.

21.verse: “Palibe kuwukira kulikonse kumene wakuona mwa Yakobo, sanaone chovuta mu Israeli. Yehova Mulungu wawo ali nawo: mfuwu wa mfumu uli pakati pawo.

22.verse: Mulungu wowatulutsa mʼdziko la Igupto, ali ndi mphamvu ngati za njati.

23.verse: Palibe matsenga amene angalimbane ndi Yakobo, palibe mawula amene angalimbane ndi Israeli. Tsopano za Yakobo ndi Israeli adzanena kuti, ‘Onani zimene Mulungu wachita!’

24.verse: Taonani, anthu anyamuka ngati mkango waukazi; adzuka okha ngati mkango waumuna umene supuma mpaka utadya nyama imene wagwira ndi kumwa magazi a nyama yogwidwayo.”

25.verse: Ndipo Balaki anati kwa Balaamu, “Usawatemberere ndi pangʼono pomwe kapena kuwadalitsa!

26.verse: “Balaamu anayankha Balaki kuti, ‘Kodi sindinakuwuzeni kuti ndiyenera kuchita zimene Yehova wanena?’ ”

27.verse: Uthenga Wachitatu wa Balaamu - Kenaka Balaki anati kwa Balaamu, “Bwera ndikutengere ku malo ena. Mwina chidzamukondweretsa Mulungu kuti uwatemberere kumeneko mʼmalo mwanga.”

28.verse: Ndipo Balaki anamutengera Balaamu pamwamba pa Peori, poyangʼanana ndi chipululu.

29.verse: Balaamu anati kwa Balaki, “Mundimangire maguwa ansembe asanu ndi awiri pano ndipo mundikonzere ngʼombe zazimuna zisanu ndi ziwiri, nkhosa zazimuna zisanu ndi ziwiri.”

30.verse: Balaki anachita monga Balaamu ananenera ndipo anapereka nsembe ngʼombe imodzi yayimuna ndi nkhosa imodzi yayimuna pa guwa lililonse.

1.verse: Tsopano Balaamu ataona kuti kunakomera Yehova kudalitsa Israeli, sanapitenso ku mawula monga ankachitira kale, koma kuyangʼana ku chipululu.

2.verse: Balaamu atayangʼana, anaona Aisraeli atamanga misasa yawo fuko ndi fuko. Pamenepo mzimu wa Mulungu unabwera pa iye

3.verse: ndipo ananena uthenga wake: “Uthenga wa Balaamu mwana wa Beori, uthenga wa amene diso lake ndi lotsekuka,

4.verse: uthenga wa amene amamva mawu a Mulungu, yemwe amaona masomphenya wochokera kwa Wamphamvuzonse, yemwe amagwa chafufumimba, koma maso ake ali chipenyere:

5.verse: “Matenti ako ndi okongola kwambiri iwe Yakobo, misasa yako, iwe Israeli!

6.verse: “Monga zigwa zotambalala, monga minda mʼmbali mwa mtsinje, monga aloe wodzalidwa ndi Yehova, monga mikungudza mʼmbali mwa madzi.

7.verse: Madzi adzayenderera mʼmitsuko yake; mbewu zake zidzakhala ndi madzi ambiri. “Mfumu yake idzakhala yamphamvu kuposa Agagi; ufumu wake udzakwezedwa.

8.verse: “Mulungu womutulutsa mʼdziko la Igupto ali ndi mphamvu ngati za njati. Amawononga mitundu yomuwukira ndi kuphwanya mafupa awo, amalasa ndi mivi yake.

9.verse: Monga mkango waumuna, amabisala nagona pansi, monga mkango waukazi, adzamuputa ndani? “Amene adalitsa iwe, adalitsike ndipo amene atemberera iwe, atembereredwe!”

10.verse: Kenaka Balaki anakwiyira Balaamu. Anawomba mʼmanja ndi kunena naye kuti, “Ndinakuyitana kuti utemberere adani anga, koma taona, wawadalitsa katatu konseka.

11.verse: Tsopano choka msanga uzipita kwanu! Ndinanena kuti ndidzakulipira bwino kwambiri, koma Yehova sanafune kuti ulandire malipirowo.”

12.verse: Balaamu anayankha Balaki kuti, “Kodi sindinawawuze amithenga amene munawatumiza kwa ine,

13.verse: kuti ngakhale Balaki atandipatsa nyumba yake yaufumu yodzaza ndi siliva ndi golide sindingathe kuchita zinthu mwa ine ndekha, zabwino kapena zoyipa, kuposa lamulo la Yehova ndi kuti ndiyenera kunena zokhazo zimene Yehova akunena?

14.verse: Tsopano ndikupita kwa anthu anga, koma tabwerani ndikuchenjezeni zimene anthu awa adzachitira anthu anu masiku akubwerawa.”

15.verse: Uthenga Wachinayi wa Balaamu - Ndipo iye ananena uthenga wake nati, “Uthenga wa Balaamu mwana wa Beori, uthenga wa amene diso lake ndi lotsekuka.

16.verse: Uthenga wa amene amamva mawu a Mulungu, amene ali ndi nzeru zochokera kwa Wammwambamwamba, amene amaona masomphenya wochokera kwa Wamphamvuzonse, amene amagwa chafufumimba koma diso lake lili lotsekuka:

17.verse: “Ndikumuona iye koma osati tsopano; ndikumupenya iye koma osati pafupi. Nyenyezi idzatuluka mwa Yakobo; ndodo yaufumu idzatuluka mwa Israeli. Iye adzagonjetsa Mowabu ndi kugonjetsa ana onse a Seti.

18.verse: Edomu adzagonjetsedwa; Seiri, mdani wake, adzawonongedwa koma mphamvu za Israeli zidzachuluka.

19.verse: Wolamulira adzachokera mwa Yakobo ndipo adzawononga otsala a mu mzindamo.”

20.verse: Uthenga Wachisanu wa Balaamu - Kenaka Balaamu anaona Aamaleki ndipo ananena uthenga wake uwu: “Aamaleki anali oyamba mwa mitundu ya anthu koma potsiriza pake adzawonongeka.”

21.verse: Uthenga Wachisanu ndi Chimodzi wa Balaamu - Kenaka anaonanso Akeni ndipo ananena uthenga wake, “Malo amene mukukhalamo ndi otetezedwa, chisa chanu chinayikidwa pa thanthwe;

22.verse: komabe inu Akeni mudzawonongedwa, pamene Asuri adzakutengeni ukapolo.”

23.verse: Uthenga Wachisanu ndi Chiwiri wa Balaamu - Ndipo ananenanso uthenga wina kuti, “Aa, ndani adzakhala ndi moyo Mulungu akachita zimenezi?

24.verse: Sitima zapamadzi zidzabwera kuchokera ku madooko a Kitimu; kupondereza Asuri ndi Eberi, koma iwonso adzawonongeka.”

25.verse: Pamenepo Balaamu ananyamuka ndi kubwerera kwawo ndipo Balaki anapitanso njira yake.

1.verse: Aisraeli Achita Chigololo - Aisraeli akukhala ku Sitimu, anayamba kuchita chigololo ndi akazi a ku Mowabu,

2.verse: amene ankawayitana ku nsembe za milungu yawo. Anthuwo anadya chakudya chopereka kwa milungu ndi kupembedza milunguyo.

3.verse: Motero Aisraeli anapembedza nawo Baala-Peori ndipo Yehova anawapsera mtima kwambiri.

4.verse: Pamenepo Yehova anawuza Mose kuti, “Tenga atsogoleri onse a anthu awa, uwaphe poyera, pamaso pa Yehova kuti mkwiyo waukulu wa Yehova uchoke pa Israeli.”

5.verse: Choncho Mose anawuza oweruza a Israeli kuti, “Aliyense wa inu ayenera kupha anthu ake amene anapembedza nawo Baala-Peori.”

6.verse: Kenaka mwamuna wina wa ku Israeli anabweretsa ku banja lake mkazi wa Chimidiyani pamaso pa Mose ndi anthu onse a Israeli pamene ankalira pa khomo la tenti ya msonkhano.

7.verse: Finehasi mwana wa Eliezara, mwana wa wansembe Aaroni ataona izi, anachoka pa msonkhanowo, natenga mkondo mʼdzanja lake.

8.verse: Ndipo anatsatira Mwisraeliyu mpaka mʼtenti yake. Anasolola mkondowo ndi kubaya awiriwo kupyola Mwisraeliyo mpaka mʼthupi la mkaziyo. Pamenepo mliri unaleka pakati pa Aisraeli.

9.verse: Pa mliriwo, anthu okwana 24,000 anafa.

10.verse: Yehova anawuza Mose kuti,

11.verse: “Finehasi mwana wa Eliezara, mwana wa wansembe Aaroni wabweza mkwiyo wanga pa Aisraeli chifukwa sanalole kuti wina aliyense apembedze mulungu wina koma Ine ndekha. Nʼchifukwa chake sindinawawononge mu mkwiyo wanga.

12.verse: Tsono muwuze kuti ndikhazikitsa pangano langa la mtendere ndi iye.

13.verse: Ndikupangana naye pangano la unsembe wosatha, iyeyo pamodzi ndi zidzukulu zake zonse, chifukwa sanalole kuti anthu awukire Ine Mulungu, ndipo anachita ntchito yopepesera machimo Aisraeli.”

14.verse: Dzina la Mwisraeli yemwe anaphedwa ndi mkazi wa Chimidiyani anali Zimuri mwana wa Salu, mtsogoleri wa banja la Simeoni.

15.verse: Ndipo dzina la mkazi wa Chimidiyani, yemwe anaphedwayo, linali Kozibi mwana wa Zuri, mtsogoleri wa fuko la ku Midiyaniko.

16.verse: Yehova anawuza Mose kuti,

17.verse: “Amidiyani ndi adani anu ndipo uwaphe,

18.verse: chifukwa ankakuonani inu ngati adani awo pamene anakupusitsani pa nkhani ya ku Peori, ndiponso za mlongo wawo Kozibi, mwana wamkazi wa mtsogoleri wa Amidiyani, mkazi yemwe anaphedwa pamene mliri unabwera chifukwa cha zimene zinachitika ku Peori.”

1.verse: Kalembera Wachiwiri - Utatha mliri Yehova anati kwa Mose ndi Eliezara mwana wa Aaroni,

2.verse: “Werengani Aisraeli onse mwa mabanja awo, onse a zaka makumi awiri kapena kuposera pamenepo omwe angathe kugwira ntchito ya usilikali mʼgulu lankhondo la Israeli.”

3.verse: Kotero mu zigwa za Mowabu pafupi ndi mtsinje wa Yorodani ku Yeriko, Mose ndi wansembe Eliezara anayankhula nawo kuti,

4.verse: “Werengani amuna a zaka makumi awiri kapena kuposera pamenepo, monga momwe Yehova walamulira Mose.” Aisraeli omwe anachokera ku Igupto ndi awa:

5.verse: Zidzukulu za Rubeni, mwana woyamba wamwamuna wa Israeli, zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Hanoki, fuko la Ahanoki; kuchokera mwa Palu, fuko la Apalu;

6.verse: kuchokera mwa Hezironi, fuko la Ahezironi; kuchokera mwa Karimi, fuko la Akarimi.

7.verse: Awa anali mafuko a Rubeni: onse amene anawerengedwa analipo 43,730.

8.verse: Mwana wa Palu anali Eliabu,

9.verse: ndipo ana a Eliabu anali Nemueli, Datani ndi Abiramu. Datani ndi Abiramu anali gulu la akuluakulu aja amene anawukira Mose ndi Aaroni ndipo analinso mʼgulu la otsatira Kora pamene anawukira Yehova.

10.verse: Nthaka inangʼambika ndi kuwameza pamodzi ndi Kora, kotero kuti gulu lawo linafa pamene moto unapsereza anthu 250 aja, nasanduka chenjezo.

11.verse: Koma ana a Kora sanafe nawo.

12.verse: Zidzukulu za Simeoni mwa mafuko awo zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Nemueli, fuko la Anemuele; kuchokera mwa Yamini, fuko la Ayamini; kuchokera mwa Yakini fuko la Ayakini;

13.verse: kuchokera mwa Zera, mbumba ya Zera; kuchokera mwa Sauli, fuko la Asauli.

14.verse: Awa anali mafuko a Simeoni. Iwowa analipo amuna 22,200.

15.verse: Zidzukulu za Gadi mwa mafuko awo ndi izi: kuchokera mwa Zefoni, fuko la Azefoni; kuchokera mwa Hagi, fuko la Ahagi; kuchokera mwa Suni, fuko la Asuni;

16.verse: kuchokera mwa Ozini, fuko la Aozini; kuchokera mwa Eri, fuko la Aeri;

17.verse: kuchokera mwa Arodi, fuko la Aarodi; kuchokera mwa Arieli, fuko la a Areli.

18.verse: Awa ndiwo anali mafuko a Gadi. Onse amene anawerengedwa analipo 40,500.

19.verse: Eri ndi Onani anali ana aamuna a Yuda, koma anafera mu Kanaani.

20.verse: Zidzukulu za Yuda monga mwa mafuko awo zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Sela, fuko la Asera; kuchokera mwa Perezi, fuko la Aperezi; kuchokera mwa Zera, mbumba ya Zera.

21.verse: Zidzukulu za Perezi zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Hezironi, fuko la Ahezironi; kuchokera mwa Hamuli, fuko la Ahamuli.

22.verse: Awa ndiwo anali mafuko a Yuda. Amene anawerenga analipo 76,500.

23.verse: Zidzukulu za Isakara monga mwa mafuko awo zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Tola, fuko la Atola; kuchokera mwa Puwa, fuko la Apuwa;

24.verse: kuchokera mwa Yasubu, fuko la Ayasubu. Kuchokera mwa Simironi, fuko la Asimironi.

25.verse: Awa ndi amene anali a fuko la Isakara. Amene anawerengedwa analipo 64,300.

26.verse: Zidzukulu za Zebuloni mwa mafuko awo zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Seredi, fuko la Aseredi; kuchokera mwa Eloni, fuko la Aeloni; kuchokera mwa Yahaleeli, fuko la Ayahaleeli.

27.verse: Awa ndiwo anali mafuko a Zebuloni. Amene anawerengedwa analipo 60,500.

28.verse: Zidzukulu za Yosefe mwa mafuko awo kupyolera mwa Manase ndi Efereimu zinali izi:

29.verse: Zidzukulu za Manase: kuchokera mwa Makiri, fuko la Amakiri (Makiri anali abambo ake a Giliyadi); kuchokera mwa Giliyadi, fuko la Agiliyadi.

30.verse: Izi ndizo zinali zidzukulu za Giliyadi; kuchokera mwa Iyezeri, fuko la Aiyezeri; kuchokera mwa Heleki, fuko la Aheleki;

31.verse: kuchokera mwa Asirieli, fuko la Aasirieli; kuchokera mwa Sekemu, fuko la Asekemu;

32.verse: kuchokera mwa Semida, fuko la Asemida; kuchokera mwa Heferi, fuko la Aheferi.

33.verse: (Zelofehadi mwana wa Heferi analibe ana aamuna koma ana aakazi okha, amene mayina awo anali: Mala, Nowa, Hogila, Milika ndi Tiriza.)

34.verse: Awa ndiwo anali mafuko a Manase. Amene anawerengedwa analipo 52,700.

35.verse: Zidzukulu za Efereimu monga mwa mafuko awo zinali izi; kuchokera mwa Sutela, fuko la Asutela; kuchokera mwa Bekeri, fuko la Abekeri; kuchokera mwa Tahani, fuko la Atahani.

36.verse: Zidzukulu za Sutela zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Erani, fuko la Aerani.

37.verse: Awa ndiwo anali mafuko a Efereimu. Amene anawerengedwa analipo 32,500. Zimenezi zinali zidzukulu za Yosefe monga mwa mafuko awo.

38.verse: Zidzukulu za Benjamini monga mwa mabanja awo zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Bela, fuko la Abela; kuchokera mwa Asibeli, fuko la Aasibeli; kuchokera mwa Ahiramu, fuko la Ahiramu;

39.verse: kuchokera mwa Sufamu, fuko la Asufamu; kuchokera mwa Hufamu, fuko la Ahufamu;

40.verse: Zidzukulu za Bela kupyolera mwa Aridi ndi Naamani zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Aridi, fuko la Aaridi; kuchokera mwa Naamani, fuko la Anaamani;

41.verse: Awa ndiwo anali mabanja a Benjamini. Amene nawerengedwa analipo 45,600.

42.verse: Zidzukulu za Dani mwa mabanja awo zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Suhamu fuko la Asuhamu. Izi zinali zidzukulu za Dani.

43.verse: Onse a fuko la Asuhamu amene anawerengedwa analipo 64,400.

44.verse: Zidzukulu za Aseri monga mwa mafuko awo zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Imina, fuko la Aimuna; kuchokera mwa Isivi, fuko la Ayisivi; kuchokera mwa Beriya, fuko la Aberiya;

45.verse: ndipo kupyolera mwa zidzukulu za Beriya: kuchokera mwa Heberi, fuko la Aheberi; kuchokera mwa Malikieli, fuko la Amalikieli;

46.verse: (Aseri anali ndi mwana wamkazi dzina lake Sera)

47.verse: Awa ndiwo anali mafuko a Aseri. Onse amene anawerengedwa analipo 53,400.

48.verse: Zidzukulu za Nafutali mwa mafuko awo zinali izi: kuchokera mwa Yahazeeli, fuko la Ayahazeeli; kuchokera mwa Guni, fuko la Aguni;

49.verse: kuchokera mwa Yezeri, fuko la Ayezeri; kuchokera mwa Silemu, fuko la Asilemu.

50.verse: Awa ndiwo anali mafuko a Nafutali. Onse amene anawerengedwa analipo 45,400.

51.verse: Chiwerengero chonse cha amuna mu Israeli chinalipo 601,730.

53.verse: “Uwagawire dziko anthu awa kuti likhale cholowa chawo molingana ndi chiwerengero cha mayina awo.

54.verse: Gulu lalikulu ulipatse cholowa chachikulu, ndipo lochepa cholowa chocheperapo. Gulu lililonse lilandire cholowa chake molingana ndi chiwerengero cha amene anawerengedwa.

55.verse: Dzikolo uligawe pochita maere. Alandire cholowa chawocho potsata mayina a mafuko a makolo awo.

56.verse: Cholowa chawo uchigawe pakati pa fuko lalikulu ndi lalingʼono mwa maere.”

57.verse: Alevi omwe anawerengedwa monga mwa mafuko awo ndi awa: kuchokera mwa Geresoni, fuko la Ageresoni; kuchokera mwa Kohati, fuko la Akohati; kuchokera mwa Merari, fuko la Amerari.

58.verse: Awanso anali mabanja a Alevi: banja la Alibini, banja la Ahebroni, banja la Amali, banja la Amusi, fuko la Kora banja la Akohati, (Kohati anali abambo a Amramu.

59.verse: Dzina la mkazi wa Amramu linali Yokobedi, mdzukulu wa Levi, yemwe anabadwa mwa Alevi mu Igupto. Yokobedi anaberekera Amramu Aaroni, Mose ndi Miriamu mlongo wawo.

60.verse: Aaroni anali abambo a Nadabu, Abihu, Eliezara ndi Itamara.

61.verse: Koma Nadabu ndi Abihu anafa pamene anapereka nsembe pamaso pa Yehova ndi moto wachilendo).

62.verse: Alevi onse aamuna a mwezi umodzi kapena kuposera pamenepa analipo 23,000. Iwowo sanawerengedwe pamodzi ndi Aisraeli ena chifukwa sanalandire cholowa pakati pawo.

63.verse: Awa ndi amene anawerengedwa ndi Mose ndi Eliezara wansembe pamene ankawerenga Aisraeli pa zigwa za ku Mowabu mʼmbali mwa Yorodani ku Yeriko.

64.verse: Mwa anthu amenewa panalibe ndi mmodzi yemwe amene anali mʼgulu la Aisraeli omwe Mose ndi wansembe Aaroni anawawerenga mʼchipululu cha Sinai;

65.verse: Chifukwa Yehova anali atawuza Aisraeliwo kuti adzafera ndithu mʼchipululu, ndipo palibe ndi mmodzi yemwe amene anatsala kupatula Kalebe mwana wa Yefune ndi Yoswa mwana wa Nuni.

1.verse: Ana Aakazi a Zelofehadi - Kenaka ana aakazi a Zelofehadi mwana wa Heferi, mwana wa Giliyadi, mwana wa Makiri, mwana wamwamuna wa Manase, a mʼmabanja a Manase, mwana wa Yosefe anabwera. Mayina a ana aakaziwo anali awa: Mala, Nowa, Hogila, Milika ndi Tiriza. Iwo anakayima

2.verse: pa chipata cha tenti ya msonkhano pamaso pa Mose, wansembe Eliezara, atsogoleri ndi anthu onse, ndipo anati,

3.verse: “Abambo athu anafera mʼchipululu koma sanali nawo mʼgulu la anthu otsatira Kora, omwe anasonkhana pamodzi kutsutsana ndi Yehova. Abambo athuwo anafa chifukwa cha tchimo lawo ndipo sanasiye ana aamuna.

4.verse: Nʼchifukwa chiyani dzina la abambo athu lasowa pakati pa fuko lawo, kodi popeza analibe mwana wamwamuna? Tipatseni cholowa chathu pakati pa abale a abambo athu.”

5.verse: Tsono Mose anabweretsa nkhani yawo pamaso pa Yehova

6.verse: ndipo Yehova anati kwa iye,

7.verse: “Zimene ana aakazi a Zelofehadi akunena ndi zoona. Uyenera kuwapatsadi cholowa chawo pakati pa abale a abambo awo ndipo uwapatse cholowa cha abambo awowo.

8.verse: “Uza Aisraeli kuti, ‘Ngati munthu afa wosasiya mwana wamwamuna, muzipereka cholowa chake kwa mwana wake wamkazi.

9.verse: Ngati alibe mwana wamkazi, muzipereka cholowa chakecho kwa abale ake.

10.verse: Ngati alibe abale muzipereka cholowa chake kwa abale a abambo ake.

11.verse: Ngati abambo ake analibe mʼbale, muzipereka cholowa chakecho kwa mnansi wake wa mʼbanja lake kuti chikhale chake. Ili likhale lamulo kwa Aisraeli, monga momwe Yehova analamulira Mose.’ ”

12.verse: Yoswa Alowa Mʼmalo mwa Mose - Kenaka Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Kwera phiri la Abarimu kuti ukaone dziko limene ndalipereka kwa Aisraeli.

13.verse: Ukakaliona udzamwalira ngati Aaroni mʼbale wako,

14.verse: chifukwa pamene anthu anawukira ku madzi a Meriba mʼchipululu cha Zini, inu nonse simunamvere lamulo londilemekeza Ine ngati Woyera pamaso pawo.” (Awa anali madzi a ku Meriba ku Kadesi mʼchipululu cha Zini).

15.verse: Mose anati kwa Yehova,

16.verse: “Ngati nʼkotheka Yehova, Mulungu wa mizimu ya anthu onse, sankhani munthu woti ayangʼanire gulu ili kuti

17.verse: alitsogolere potuluka ndi polowa, kuti anthu a Yehova asakhale ngati nkhosa zopanda mʼbusa.”

18.verse: Pamenepo Yehova anawuza Mose kuti, “Tenga Yoswa mwana wa Nuni, munthu amene ali ndi mzimu wa utsogoleri, ndipo umusanjike dzanja lako.

19.verse: Umuyimiritse pamaso pa wansembe Eliezara ndi pamaso pa gulu lonse ndipo umupatse mphamvu zolamulira, anthuwo akuona.

20.verse: Umupatse gawo lina la ulemerero wako kuti Aisraeli onse azimumvera.

21.verse: Ayime pamaso pa wansembe Eliezara, amene adzamudziwitse zimene Yehova akufuna pogwiritsa ntchito Urimu. Iye akalamula, Aisraeli onse azituluka ndipo akalamulanso, Aisraeliwo azibwereranso.”

22.verse: Mose anachita monga Yehova anamulamulira. Anatenga Yoswa ndi kumuyimiritsa pamaso pa Eliezara wansembe ndi pamaso pa gulu lonse.

23.verse: Ndipo anamusanjika manja ndi kumupatsa mphamvu, monga Yehova ananenera kudzera mwa Mose.

1.verse: Zopereka za Tsiku ndi Tsiku - Yehova anawuza Mose kuti,

2.verse: “Lamula Aisraeli kuti, ‘Onetsetsani kuti mukupereka kwa Ine pa nthawi yoyikika, chopereka cha chakudya chotentha pa moto monga fungo lokoma kwa Ine.’

3.verse: Awuze kuti, ‘Nsembe ya chakudya imene muzipereka pa moto kwa Yehova tsiku ndi tsiku ndi iyi: Ana ankhosa a chaka chimodzi awiri, wopanda chilema.

4.verse: Mmawa muzipereka mwana wankhosa mmodzi ndipo winayo madzulo.

5.verse: Muziperekanso kilogalamu imodzi ya ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi lita imodzi ya mafuta a olivi.

6.verse: Iyi ndi nsembe yopsereza ya tsiku ndi tsiku imene analamula pa phiri la Sinai kuti ikhale fungo lokoma, nsembe yopsereza pa moto yopereka kwa Yehova.

7.verse: Chopereka chachakumwa chikhale lita imodzi yachakumwa chaukali pa nkhosa iliyonse. Muzithira pamalo opatulika, kupereka kwa Yehova.

8.verse: Muzipereka mwana wankhosa winayo madzulo, pamodzi ndi chopereka chachakudya monga poyamba paja ndi chopereka chachakumwa monga mmawa. Ichi ndi chopereka chachakudya, fungo lokoma kwa Yehova.’ ”

9.verse: Zopereka za pa Sabata - “ ‘Pa tsiku la Sabata, muzipereka nsembe ana ankhosa awiri a chaka chimodzi wopanda chilema, pamodzi ndi chopereka chachakumwa ndi chopereka chachakudya chokwana makilogalamu awiri a ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi mafuta.

10.verse: Iyi ndi nsembe yopsereza ya pa Sabata iliyonse, kuwonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya nthawi zonse ndi chopereka chake chachakumwa.’ ”

11.verse: Zopereka za pa Mwezi - “Pa tsiku loyamba la mwezi uliwonse muzipereka kwa Yehova nsembe yopsereza ya ana angʼombe aamuna awiri, nkhosa yayimuna imodzi, ana ankhosa aamuna asanu ndi awiri a chaka chimodzi, onse wopanda chilema.

12.verse: Pa ngʼombe yayimuna iliyonse pakhale chopereka cha chakudya cha makilogalamu atatu a ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi mafuta; ndi nkhosa yayimuna, chopereka cha chakudya cha makilogalamu awiri a ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi mafuta;

13.verse: ndipo pa mwana wankhosa aliyense, chopereka cha ufa wa kilogalamu imodzi ya ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi mafuta, izi ndi za nsembe yopsereza, fungo lokoma, nsembe yotentha pa moto ya kwa Yehova.

14.verse: Pa ngʼombe yayimuna iliyonse pakhale chopereka cha chakumwa cha malita awiri a vinyo; ndipo pa nkhosa yayimuna, lita limodzi ndi theka, ndipo pa mwana wankhosa, lita limodzi. Iyi ndi nsembe yopsereza ya mwezi ndi mwezi yoperekedwa pa mwezi watsopano mʼkati mwa chaka.

15.verse: Powonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya nthawi zonse ndi chopereka chake cha chakumwa, mbuzi yayimuna imodzi iperekedwe kwa Yehova ngati nsembe yopepesera machimo.

16.verse: Paska - “ ‘Pa tsiku la 14 la mwezi woyamba muzichita Paska wa Yehova.

17.verse: Pa tsiku la 15 la mwezi womwewo pazikhala chikondwerero. Muzidya buledi wopanda yisiti kwa masiku asanu ndi awiri.

18.verse: Pa tsiku loyamba muzichita msonkhano wopatulika ndipo musamagwire ntchito iliyonse.

19.verse: Koma muzipereka kwa Yehova nsembe yotentha pa moto, nsembe yopsereza ya ana angʼombe aamuna awiri, nkhosa yayimuna imodzi ndi ana ankhosa asanu ndi awiri aamuna a chaka chimodzi, onsewo wopanda chilema.

20.verse: Pamodzi ndi ngʼombe yayimuna iliyonse, muzikonza chopereka cha chakudya cha makilogalamu atatu a ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi mafuta; makilogalamu awiri pa nkhosa yayimuna iliyonse.

21.verse: Kilogalamu imodzi pa mwana wankhosa aliyense mwa ana ankhosa asanu ndi awiri aja.

22.verse: Muziphatikizapo mbuzi yayimuna monga nsembe yopepesera machimo anu.

23.verse: Muzikonza zimenezi nthawi zonse, powonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya mmawa.

24.verse: Motere muzikonza chakudya cha nsembe yopsereza ya tsiku ndi tsiku pa masiku asanu ndi awiri ngati fungo lokomera Yehova. Zimenezi ziziperekedwa kuwonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya nthawi zonse pamodzi ndi nsembe yachakumwa.

25.verse: Pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri muzichita msonkhano wopatulika ndipo musamagwire ntchito iliyonse.

26.verse: Madyerero a Masabata - “ ‘Pa tsiku la zipatso zoyambirira kucha, pamene mukupereka chopereka cha chakudya chatsopano kwa Yehova, pa nthawi ya chikondwerero cha Masabata, muzichita msonkhano wopatulika ndipo musagwire ntchito zolemetsa.

27.verse: Muzipereka nsembe zopsereza za ana angʼombe aamuna awiri, nkhosa imodzi yayimuna ndi ana ankhosa aamuna asanu ndi awiri a chaka chimodzi monga fungo lokomera Yehova.

28.verse: Pa ngʼombe yayimuna iliyonse pazikhala chopereka cha chakudya cha makilogalamu atatu a ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi mafuta, pa nkhosa yayimuna iliyonse makilogalamu awiri.

29.verse: Ndipo pa mwana wankhosa aliyense mwa asanu ndi awiri aja, kilogalamu imodzi.

30.verse: Muziperekanso mbuzi yayimuna imodzi kuti izikhala nsembe yopepesera machimo anu.

31.verse: Muzipereka zimenezi pamodzi ndi zopereka za zakumwa ndi nsembe yake ya chakudya. Onetsetsani kuti nyamazo zilibe chilema.

1.verse: Chikondwerero cha Malipenga - “ ‘Pa tsiku loyamba la mwezi wachisanu ndi chiwiri muzichita msonkhano wopatulika ndipo musamagwire ntchito iliyonse. Ili ndi tsiku limene muziliza malipenga.

2.verse: Muzipereka mwana wangʼombe wamwamuna mmodzi, nkhosa yayimuna imodzi ndi ana ankhosa asanu ndi awiri a chaka chimodzi wopanda chilema monga nsembe zopsereza, fungo lokoma kwa Yehova.

3.verse: Pa ngʼombe yayimuna iliyonse, muzipereka chopereka cha chakudya cha makilogalamu atatu a ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi mafuta. Pa nkhosa yayimuna iliyonse muzipereka makilogalamu awiri.

4.verse: Pa mwana wankhosa aliyense mwa asanu ndi awiri aja muzipereka kilogalamu imodzi.

5.verse: Muziperekanso mbuzi yayimuna kuti izikhala nsembe yopepesera machimo anu.

6.verse: Izi ndi zowonjezera pa nsembe zopsereza za mwezi ndi mwezi komanso za tsiku ndi tsiku pamodzi ndi zopereka za chakudya ndi zopereka za chakumwa potsata malamulo ake. Izi ndi zopereka zotentha pa moto, zoperekedwa kwa Yehova, fungo lokoma.

7.verse: Tsiku la Mwambo Wopepesera Machimo - “ ‘Pa tsiku lakhumi la mwezi wachisanu ndi chiwiriwu, muzichita msonkhano wopatulika. Muzisala zakudya ndipo musamagwire ntchito.

8.verse: Muzipereka kwa Yehova nsembe yopsereza, yotulutsa fungo lokoma lokondweretsa Yehovayo; ngʼombe yayimuna imodzi, nkhosa yayimuna imodzi ndi ana ankhosa asanu ndi awiri a chaka chimodzi. Zimenezi zizikhala zopanda chilema.

9.verse: Pa ngʼombe yayimuna iliyonse, muzikonza chopereka cha chakudya cha makilogalamu atatu a ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi mafuta; pa nkhosa yayimuna iliyonse makilogalamu awiri;

10.verse: kilogalamu imodzi pa mwana wankhosa aliyense mwa asanu ndi awiriwo.

11.verse: Muziperekanso mbuzi imodzi yayimuna kuti izikhala nsembe yopepesera machimo, kuwonjezera pa nsembe yopepesera machimo ya pa tsiku la mwambo ija, kuwonjezanso pa nsembe zopsereza za tsiku ndi tsiku zija, pamodzi ndi chopereka chake cha chakudya ndi cha chakumwa.

12.verse: Chikondwerero cha Misasa - “ ‘Pa tsiku la mwezi wachisanu ndi chiwiri, muzichita msonkhano wopatulika ndipo musamagwire ntchito iliyonse. Muzichita madyerero a Yehova masiku asanu ndi awiri.

13.verse: Muzipereka nsembe yotentha pa moto, kuti izikhala fungo lokoma kwa Yehova, nsembe yopsereza ya ana angʼombe aamuna khumi ndi atatu, nkhosa zazimuna ziwiri, ndi ana ankhosa aamuna khumi ndi anayi a chaka chimodzi, zonse zopanda chilema.

14.verse: Pa mwana wangʼombe aliyense mwa ana angʼombe aamuna khumi ndi atatu aja, muzikonza chopereka cha chakudya cha makilogalamu atatu a ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi mafuta. Pa nkhosa iliyonse mwa nkhosa ziwiri zija, mukonza chopereka cha chakudya cha makilogalamu awiri.

15.verse: Pa mwana wankhosa aliyense mwa ana ankhosa aamuna khumi ndi anayiwo, muzipereka chakudya cha kilogalamu imodzi.

16.verse: Muziperekanso mbuzi yayimuna imodzi kuti izikhale nsembe yopepesera machimo, kuwonjezera pa nsembe zopsereza za tsiku ndi tsiku zija pamodzi ndi chopereka chake cha chakudya ndi chakumwa.

17.verse: “ ‘Pa tsiku lachiwiri muzipereka ana angʼombe aamuna khumi ndi awiri aja, nkhosa zazimuna ziwiri ndi ana ankhosa aamuna khumi ndi anayi a chaka chimodzi aja, zonse zopanda chilema.

18.verse: Pamodzi ndi ngʼombe zazimuna, nkhosa zazimuna ndi ana ankhosa, muzipereka zopereka za chakudya ndi za chakumwa molingana ndi chiwerengero cha nyamazo.

19.verse: Muziperekanso mbuzi imodzi yayimuna ya nsembe yopepesera machimo powonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya tsiku ndi tsiku pamodzi ndi chopereka chake cha chakudya ndi chakumwa.

20.verse: “ ‘Pa tsiku lachitatu muzipereka ngʼombe zazimuna khumi ndi imodzi, nkhosa zazimuna ziwiri ndi ana ankhosa aamuna khumi ndi anayi a chaka chimodzi, zonse zopanda chilema.

21.verse: Pamodzi ndi ngʼombe zazimuna, nkhosa zazimuna ndi ana ankhosa, muzipereka zopereka za chakudya ndi za chakumwa molingana ndi chiwerengero cha nyamazo.

22.verse: Muziperekanso mbuzi imodzi yayimuna ya nsembe yopepesera machimo, powonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya tsiku ndi tsiku pamodzi ndi chopereka chake cha chakudya ndi chakumwa.

23.verse: “ ‘Pa tsiku lachinayi muzipereka ngʼombe zazimuna khumi, nkhosa zazimuna ziwiri ndi ana ankhosa aamuna khumi ndi anayi a chaka chimodzi, zonse zopanda chilema.

24.verse: Pamodzi ndi ngʼombe zazimuna, nkhosa zazimuna ndi ana ankhosa, muzipereka chopereka cha chakudya ndi chakumwa molingana ndi chiwerengero cha nyamazo.

25.verse: Muziperekanso mbuzi imodzi yayimuna ya nsembe yopepesera machimo, powonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya tsiku ndi tsiku pamodzi ndi chopereka chake cha chakudya ndi chakumwa.

26.verse: “ ‘Pa tsiku lachisanu muzipereka ngʼombe zazimuna zisanu ndi zinayi, nkhosa zazimuna ziwiri ndi ana ankhosa aamuna khumi ndi anayi a chaka chimodzi, zonse zopanda chilema.

27.verse: Pamodzi ndi ngʼombe zazimuna, nkhosa zazimuna ndi ana ankhosa, muzipereka chopereka cha chakudya ndi chakumwa molingana ndi chiwerengero cha nyamazo.

28.verse: Muziperekanso mbuzi imodzi yayimuna ya nsembe yopepesera machimo, powonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya tsiku ndi tsiku ndi chopereka chake cha chakudya ndi chakumwa.

29.verse: “ ‘Pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chimodzi muzipereka ngʼombe zazimuna zisanu ndi zitatu, nkhosa zazimuna ziwiri ndi ana ankhosa aamuna khumi ndi anayi a chaka chimodzi, zonse zopanda chilema.

30.verse: Pamodzi ndi ngʼombe zazimuna, nkhosa zazimuna ndi ana ankhosa, muzipereka chopereka cha chakudya ndi cha chakumwa molingana ndi chiwerengero cha nyamazo.

31.verse: Muziperekenso mbuzi imodzi yayimuna ya nsembe yopepesera machimo, powonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya tsiku ndi tsiku pamodzi ndi chopereka chake cha chakudya ndi chakumwa.

32.verse: “ ‘Pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri muzipereka ngʼombe zazimuna zisanu ndi ziwiri, nkhosa zazimuna ziwiri ndi ana ankhosa amuna khumi ndi anayi a chaka chimodzi, zonse zopanda chilema.

33.verse: Pamodzi ndi ngʼombe zazimuna, nkhosa zazimuna ndi ana ankhosa, muzipereka chopereka cha chakudya ndi chakumwa molingana ndi chiwerengero cha nyamazo.

34.verse: Muziperekanso mbuzi imodzi yayimuna ya nsembe yopepesera machimo, powonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya tsiku ndi tsiku pamodzi ndi chopereka chake cha chakudya ndi chakumwa.

35.verse: “ ‘Pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chitatu muzichita msonkhano ndipo musamagwire ntchito iliyonse.

36.verse: Muzipereka chopereka chotentha pa moto monga fungo lokoma kwa Yehova, nsembe yopsereza ya ngʼombe imodzi yayimuna, nkhosa yayimuna imodzi ndi ana ankhosa amuna asanu ndi awiri a chaka chimodzi, zonse zopanda chilema.

37.verse: Pamodzi ndi ngʼombe yayimunayo, nkhosa yayimunayo ndi ana ankhosawo, muzipereka chopereka cha chakudya ndi chakumwa molingana ndi chiwerengero cha nyamazo.

38.verse: Muziperekanso mbuzi imodzi yayimuna ya nsembe yopepesera machimo, powonjezera pa nsembe yopsereza ya tsiku ndi tsiku pamodzi ndi chopereka chake cha chakudya ndi chakumwa.

39.verse: “ ‘Kuwonjezera pa zopereka zimene munalumbirira ndi pa zopereka zanu zaufulu, muzipereka zimenezi kwa Yehova pa masiku osankhika a chikondwerero chanu. Nsembe zanu zachakumwa ndi nsembe zanu zachiyanjano.’ ”

40.verse: Mose anawuza Aisraeli zonse zimene Yehova anamulamulira.

1.verse: Za Kulumbira - Mose anawuza Aisraeli onse zonse zimene Yehova anamulamula. Iye anati, “Zimene Yehova walamula ndi izi:

2.verse: Munthu wamwamuna ngati walonjeza kwa Yehova kapena kulumbira kuti adzachita zimene walumbirazo, asaphwanye mawuwo koma ayenera kuchita chilichonse chimene wanena.

3.verse: “Pamene munthu wamkazi amene akukhalabe mʼnyumba ya abambo ake alumbira kwa Yehova kuti adzachita zimene walonjeza pa ubwana wake,

4.verse: abambo ake namva kulumbira kwakeko kapena kulonjeza kwake kuti adzachitadi, ndipo abambo akewo wosayankhula kanthu, mkaziyo achitedi zomwe analumbirazo. Ayenera kudzachita zonse zimene walonjeza zija.

5.verse: Koma ngati abambo akewo amva kulumbira kwake ndi kumukaniza, palibe lamulo lomukakamiza mkaziyo kuchita zimene walonjeza. Yehova adzamukhululukira chifukwa abambo ake anamukaniza.

6.verse: “Ngati akwatiwa atalumbira kale kapena ngati alonjeza mofulumira ndi pakamwa pake,

7.verse: mwamuna wake ndi kumva kulumbira kwakeko koma wosanenapo kanthu, mkaziyo achitedi zomwe walumbirazo. Achite ndithu zomwe walonjeza zija.

8.verse: Koma ngati mwamuna wake amuletsa atamva kulumbira kwakeko, pamenepo amumasula mayiyo ku zimene analumbira komanso ku zimene analonjeza mosaganiza bwinozo ndipo Yehova adzamukhululukira.

9.verse: “Mayi wamasiye kapena wosiyidwa ukwati akalumbira kapena kulonjeza kuti adzachita kanthu kalikonse, ayenera kukachitadi.

10.verse: “Koma ngati mayi wokwatiwa alumbira nalonjeza kuti adzachitadi zimene walonjeza,

11.verse: mwamuna wake ndi kumva kulumbira kwakeko koma osayankhulapo kanthu, osamuletsa, ayenera kuchitadi zonse zimene walumbira ndi zonse zimene walonjeza.

12.verse: Koma ngati mwamuna wake amva ndi kumuletsa kuti asachite zomwe walumbirazo, palibe lamulo lomukakamiza mayiyo kuchita zomwe walumbirazo kapenanso zimene walonjeza. Popeza mwamuna wake wamuletsa, Yehova adzamukhululukira mayiyo.

13.verse: Mwamuna wake ali ndi mphamvu zovomereza kapena kukana zimene mayiyo walumbira kapena zimene walonjeza zokhudza kudzilanga yekha.

14.verse: Ndipo ngati mmawa mwake ndi masiku otsatira mwamuna wake sanenapo kanthu atamva zimenezi, mayiyo achitedi zimene walumbira kapena zimene walonjeza. Mwamunayo wavomereza zimenezo, chifukwa sanamuwuze kanthu mayiyo pa tsiku limene anamva akulonjeza kapena kulumbira.

15.verse: Koma ngati mwamunayo amukaniza patapita kanthawi atazimva kale, iyeyo ndiye wochimwa mʼmalo mwa mayiyo.”

16.verse: Awa ndiwo malamulo amene Yehova analamula Mose za mwamuna ndi mkazi wake, ndiponso abambo ndi mwana wawo wamkazi amene akanali mtsikana wokhalabe mʼnyumba ya abambo akewo.

1.verse: Aisraeli Agonjetsa Amidiyani - Yehova anawuza Mose kuti,

2.verse: “Uwabwezere zoyipa Amidiyani chifukwa cha zimene anachitira Aisraeli. Ukatha kuchita zimenezi, iwe udzamwalira.”

3.verse: Ndipo Mose anati kwa Aisraeli, “Perekani zida kwa ena mwa anthu anu kuti akamenyane ndi Amidiyani ndi kuwabwezera choyipa mʼmalo mwa Yehova.

4.verse: Mutumize ku nkhondoko amuna 1,000 kuchokera ku fuko lililonse la Aisraeli.”

5.verse: Choncho amuna okwana 12,000 anatenga zida kukonzekera nkhondo, anthu 1,000 kuchokera ku fuko lililonse la Aisraeli.

6.verse: Mose anawatumiza ku nkhondo, anthu 1,000 kuchokera ku fuko lililonse pamodzi ndi Finehasi mwana wa Eliezara wansembe amene ananyamula zipangizo zochokera ku malo wopatulika ndi malipenga okaliza.

7.verse: Iwo anamenyana ndi Amidiyani monga momwe Yehova analamulira Mose ndipo anapha mwamuna aliyense.

8.verse: Mwa anthu ophedwawo munali Evi, Rekemu, Zuri, Huri ndi Reba, mafumu asanu a Amidiyani. Ndipo anaphanso ndi lupanga Balaamu mwana wa Beori.

9.verse: Aisraeli anagwira ukapolo amayi a Chimidiyani ndi ana awo ndipo analandanso ngʼombe, ziweto zawo zina zonse ndi katundu wawo yense.

10.verse: Anawotcha mizinda yonse imene Amidiyani ankakhalamo pamodzi ndi misasa yawo yonse.

11.verse: Anatenga zonse zimene analanda ku nkhondoko, anthu ndi zoweta zomwe.

12.verse: Ndipo anabwera nawo akapolowo ndi zolanda ku nkhondozo kwa Mose ndi kwa wansembe Eliezara ndi kwa gulu lonse la Aisraeli ku misasa yawo ku chigwa cha Mowabu, mʼmbali mwa mtsinje wa Yorodani ku Yeriko.

13.verse: Mose, wansembe Eliezara ndi atsogoleri onse a gululo anapita kukakumana nawo kunja kwa misasa.

14.verse: Mose anakwiya nawo akuluakulu a magulu a ankhondowo: olamulira 1,000 ndi olamulira 100, amene ankachokera ku nkhondo.

15.verse: Iye anafunsa kuti, “Kodi nʼchifukwa chiyani mwawaleka amoyo amayi onsewa?”

16.verse: Paja iwo ndi amene ankatsatira uphungu wa Balaamu ndiponso ndi amene anachititsa Aisraeli kuti asiye Yehova pa zimene zinachitika ku Peori, kotero mliri unagwera anthu a Yehova.

17.verse: Tsopano iphani munthu wamwamuna aliyense. Ndiponso iphani mayi aliyense amene anagonapo ndi mwamuna,

18.verse: koma sungani mtsikana aliyense amene sanagonepo ndi mwamuna.

19.verse: “Inu nonse amene mwaphapo wina wake, kapena kukhudza aliyense amene anaphedwa mukhale kunja kwa msasa masiku asanu ndi awiri. Pa tsiku lachitatu mudziyeretse nokha pamodzi ndi akapolo anu.

20.verse: Muyeretsenso zovala zanu ndi china chilichonse chopangidwa ndi chikopa, ubweya wa mbuzi kapenanso ndi mtengo.”

21.verse: Tsono wansembe Eliezara anati kwa asilikali amene anapita ku nkhondo aja, “Lamulo limene Yehova anapereka kwa Mose ndi ili:

22.verse: Golide, siliva, mkuwa, chitsulo, chiwaya, mtovu

23.verse: ndi china chilichonse chimene sichingapse ndi moto muchidutsitse pa moto, ndipo chidzayeretsedwa. Komanso chiyeretsedwe ndi madzi oyeretsa. Ndipo chilichonse chimene chingapse ndi moto muchidutsitse mʼmadzimo.

24.verse: Pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri muchape zovala zanu ndipo mudzayera. Mukatero mutha kulowa mu msasa.”

25.verse: Kugawana Zolanda ku Nkhondo - Yehova anawuza Mose kuti,

26.verse: “Iwe ndi wansembe Eliezara ndiponso akuluakulu a mabanja a anthuwa, muwerenge anthu onse ndi ziweto zomwe zinagwidwa ku nkhondo.

27.verse: Mugawe zolanda ku nkhondozo magawo awiri, lina la ankhondo amene anapita ku nkhondo, lina la anthu onse.

28.verse: Pa gawo la ankhondowo, mutengeko gawo la Yehova, pa zofunkha 500 zilizonse mutengeko chimodzi, pa akapolo, ngʼombe, bulu ndi nkhosa.

29.verse: Utenge zimenezo pa theka la gawo la ankhondowo ndipo upereke kwa wansembe Eliezara kuti zikhale zopereka zanu kwa Yehova.

30.verse: Kuchokera pa theka la gawo la Aisraeli, utengeko cholanda chimodzi pa makumi asanu aliwonse, pa anthu, ngʼombe, abulu, nkhosa, mbuzi kapena zoweta zina. Uzipereke kwa Alevi amene ntchito yawo ndi yosamalira tenti ya Yehova.”

31.verse: Ndipo Mose ndi wansembe Eliezara anachita monga Yehova analamulira Mose.

32.verse: Zotsala pa zolanda ku nkhondo zimene ankhondowo anatenga zinali nkhosa 675,000,

35.verse: ndi atsikana omwe sanagonepo ndi mwamuna 32,000.

36.verse: Gawo la ankhondo amene anapita ku nkhondo linali: nkhosa 337,500,

37.verse: mwa zimenezi gawo la Yehova linali 675;

38.verse: ngʼombe zinalipo 36,000 ndipo gawo la Yehova linali 72;

39.verse: abulu analipo 30,500 ndipo gawo la Yehova linali 61;

40.verse: anthu analipo 16,000 ndipo gawo la Yehova linali 32.

41.verse: Mose anapereka kwa wansembe Eliezara gawo limene linali loyenera kupereka kwa Yehova monga momwe Yehova analamulira Mose.

42.verse: Pa gawo la Aisraeli, Mose anapatula theka limodzi kuchotsa pa zolanda ku nkhondo zonse zimene zinabwera ndi ankhondo aja.

43.verse: Tsono gawo la Aisraeli linali ili: nkhosa 337,500,

47.verse: Kuchoka pa gawo la Aisraelilo, Mose anatengapo chimodzi pa zolanda ku nkhondo makumi asanu aliwonse, anthu ndi nyama, ndipo anazipereka kwa Alevi amene ankayangʼanira tenti ya Yehova monga Yehova analamulira Mose.

48.verse: Pamenepo omwe ankayangʼanira magulu a ankhondo olamulira 1,000 ndi olamulira 100 anabwera kwa Mose,

49.verse: iwo anati kwa iye, “Ife anthu anu tawerenga ankhondo amene timawalamulira. Palibe munthu ndi mmodzi yemwe amene wasowa.

50.verse: Ndipo tabweretsa zopereka kwa Yehova zimene munthu aliyense anapeza: ziwiya zagolide, zibangiri, zigwinjiri, mphete zosindikizira, ndolo ndi mikanda kuti tichitire mwambo wopepesera machimo pamaso pa Yehova.”

51.verse: Ndipo Mose ndi wansembe Eliezara analandira kuchokera kwa atsogoleriwo golide pamodzi ndi zipangizo zonse zosula.

52.verse: Golide yense wochokera kwa atsogoleri a 1,000 ndi atsogoleri a 100 zomwe Mose ndi Eliezara anapereka ngati mphatso kwa Yehova zinali zolemera makilogalamu 200.

53.verse: Wankhondo aliyense anatenga zomwe analanda yekha ku nkhondo.

54.verse: Mose ndi Eliezara wansembe analandira golide kuchokera kwa atsogoleri a 1,000 ndi atsogoleri a 100 ndi kukamuyika mu tenti ya msonkhano ngati chikumbutso cha Aisraeli pamaso pa Yehova.

1.verse: Mafuko a ku Tsidya la Yorodani - Arubeni ndi Agadi amene anali ndi ngʼombe zambiri ndi ziweto zina anaona dziko la Yazeri ndi la Giliyadi kuti linali labwino kwa ziwetozo.

2.verse: Choncho Arubeni ndi Agadi anapita kwa Mose ndi kwa wansembe Eliezara ndi kwa atsogoleri a anthu ndi kunena kuti,

3.verse: “Ataroti, Diboni, Yazeri, Nimira, Hesiboni, Eleali, Sebamu, Nebo ndi Beoni,

4.verse: dziko lomwe Yehova anagonjetsa pamaso pa Aisraeli, ndiwo malo woyenera ziweto, ndipo atumiki anufe tili ndi ziweto.

5.verse: Iwo anati, ‘Ngati tapeza ufulu pamaso panu atumiki anufe, mutipatse dziko limeneli kuti likhale lathu. Tisawoloke nanu Yorodani.’ ”

6.verse: Ndipo Mose anati kwa Agadi ndi Arubeni, “Kodi anthu a mtundu wanu apite ku nkhondo inu mutangokhala kuno?

7.verse: Chifukwa chiyani mukufowoketsa Aisraeli kupita mʼdziko limene Yehova wawapatsa?

8.verse: Izi ndi zimene makolo anu anachita pamene ndinawatuma kuchokera ku Kadesi kukaona dzikolo.

9.verse: Atapita ku chigwa cha Esikolo, ndi kuliona dzikolo, anafowoketsa Aisraeli kuti asalowe mʼdziko limene Yehova anawapatsa.

10.verse: Yehova anakwiya tsiku limenelo ndipo analumbira kuti,

11.verse: ‘Chifukwa sananditsatire ndi mtima wonse, palibe ndi mmodzi yemwe mwa amuna a zaka makumi awiri kapena kuposa pamenepo, amene anachokera ku Igupto, amene adzaone dziko limene ndinalonjeza mwa lumbiro kwa Abrahamu, Isake ndi Yakobo.

12.verse: Palibe ndi mmodzi yemwe kupatula Kalebe mwana wa Yefune, Mkeni, ndi Yoswa mwana wa Nuni chifukwa anatsatira Yehova ndi mtima wonse.’

13.verse: Yehova anakwiyira Aisraeli kwambiri ndipo anawachititsa kuyenda mʼchipululu zaka makumi anayi, mpaka mʼbado wonse wa anthu amene anachita choyipa pamaso pake unatha.

14.verse: “Ndipo onani tsopano, inu mʼbado wochimwa, mwalowa mʼmalo mwa makolo anu ndipo mwachititsa kuti Yehova akwiyire Israeli kwambiri.

15.verse: Ngati muleka kumutsata, Iye adzawasiyiranso anthu onsewa mʼchipululu ndipo mudzawonongetsa anthu onsewa.”

16.verse: Ndipo iwo anabwera kwa Mose namuwuza kuti, “Ife tikufuna kumanga makola a ziweto zathu kuno ndi mizinda yokhalamo akazi athu ndi ana athu.

17.verse: Koma ndife okonzeka kutenga zida za nkhondo ndi kupita pamodzi ndi Aisraeli mpaka titakawafikitsa ku malo awo. Panopa, akazi ndi ana athu akhala mʼmizinda yotetezedwa, kuwateteza kwa anthu okhala mʼdzikoli.

18.verse: Sitidzabwerera ku midzi yathu mpaka Mwisraeli aliyense atalandira cholowa chake.

19.verse: Sitidzalandira cholowa chilichonse pamodzi nawo ku tsidya lina la Yorodani, chifukwa cholowa chathu tachipezera ku tsidya lino la kummawa kwa Yorodani.”

20.verse: Tsono Mose anati kwa anthuwo, “Ngati inu mudzachita zimenezi, kutenga zida zankhondo pamaso pa Yehova kuti muchite nkhondo,

21.verse: ndipo ngati nonsenu mudzapita ndi zida kuwoloka Yorodani pamaso pa Yehova mpaka atachotsa adani ake pamaso pake,

22.verse: dzikolo nʼkugonja pamaso pa Yehova, mudzabwera ndi kukhala mfulu pamaso pa Yehova ndi Aisraeli. Ndipo dziko lino lidzakhala lanu pamaso pa Yehova.

23.verse: “Koma mukalephera kuchita izi, mudzakhala mukuchimwira Yehova. Ndipo dziwani kuti tchimo lanu lidzakupezani.

24.verse: Amangireni akazi ndi ana anu mizinda, mangani makola a ziweto zanu, koma chitani zomwe mwalonjeza.”

25.verse: Agadi ndi Arubeni anati kwa Mose, “Ife antchito anu tidzachita monga mbuye wathu mwalamulira.

26.verse: Ana ndi akazi athu, ziweto zathu zina ndi ngʼombe zidzatsala kuno ku mizinda ya Giliyadi,

27.verse: koma antchito anufe, mwamuna aliyense amene ali ndi chida cha nkhondo, adzawoloka kukamenya nkhondo pamaso pa Yehova monga mbuye wathu wanenera.”

28.verse: Choncho Mose anapereka malamulo awa kwa wansembe Eliezara, kwa Yoswa mwana wa Nuni ndi kwa akulu a mafuko a Aisraeli.

29.verse: Mose anawawuza kuti, ngati Agadi ndi Arubeni, mwamuna aliyense wokonzekera nkhondo, awoloka Yorodani pamodzi ndi inu pamaso pa Yehova, ndipo dzikolo nʼkugonjetsedwa pamaso panu, mudzawapatse dziko la Giliyadi kukhala lawo.

30.verse: Koma ngati sawoloka pamodzi nanu ndi zida zankhondo, ayenera kulandira cholowa chawo pamodzi ndi inu ku Kanaani.

31.verse: Agadi ndi Arubeni anayankha kuti, “Antchito anu adzachita zimene Yehova wanena.

32.verse: Tidzawoloka pamaso pa Yehova ndipo tidzalowa mu Kanaani ndi zida zankhondo, koma cholowa chathu chidzakhala ku tsidya lino la Yorodani.”

33.verse: Choncho Mose anapatsa Agadi, Arubeni ndi theka la fuko la Manase mwana wa Yosefe dziko la Sihoni mfumu ya Aamori ndi dziko la Ogi, mfumu ya ku Basani, dziko lonse, mizinda yake ndi midzi yowazungulira.

36.verse: Beti-Nimira ndi Beti-Harani mizinda ya malinga. Anamanganso makola a ziweto zawo.

37.verse: Ndipo Arubeni anamanga Hesiboni, Eleali, Kiriataimu,

38.verse: Nebo ndi Baala-Meoni (mayina awa anasinthidwa) ndi Sibima. Anapereka mayina ku mizinda ina yomwe anamangayo.

39.verse: Zidzukulu za Makiri mwana wa Manase zinapita ku Giliyadi kulanda mzindawo ndi kuthamangitsira kunja Aamori omwe anali kumeneko.

40.verse: Tsono Mose anapereka Giliyadi kwa Amakiri, ana a Manase, ndipo anakhala kumeneko.

41.verse: Yairi, mwana wa Manase analanda midzi yambiri ya Giliyadi ndi kuyitcha kuti Havoti-Yairi.

42.verse: Ndipo Noba analanda Kenati ndi midzi yozungulira ndi kuyitcha Noba, kutengera dzina la iye mwini.

1.verse: Malo omwe Aisraeli Anayima pa Ulendo Wawo - Malo otsatirawa ndi omwe Aisraeli anayima pa maulendo awo atatuluka mʼdziko la Igupto mʼmagulu awo motsogozedwa ndi Mose ndi Aaroni.

2.verse: Mose analemba malo amene anayambira maulendo awo molamulidwa ndi Yehova. Maulendo awo ndi malo omwe anayambira ndi awa:

3.verse: Aisraeli ananyamuka kuchokera ku Ramesesi pa tsiku la 15 la mwezi woyamba, itangotha Paska. Iwo anatuluka nayenda molimba mtima Aigupto onse akuona,

4.verse: pamene ankayika maliro a ana awo oyamba kubadwa, omwe Yehova anawakantha pakati pawo chifukwa Yehova anaweruza milungu yawo.

5.verse: Aisraeli atachoka ku Ramesesi, anamanga misasa yawo ku Sukoti.

6.verse: Atachoka ku Sukoti anakamanga misasa yawo ku Etamu, mʼmbali mwa chipululu.

7.verse: Ndipo atachoka ku Etamu, anabwerera ku Pihahiroti, kummawa kwa Baala-Zefoni, ndipo anamanga misasa yawo pafupi ndi Migidoli.

8.verse: Atachoka ku Pihahiroti anadutsa mʼkati mwa nyanja kupita ku chipululu ndipo atayenda masiku atatu mʼchipululu cha Etamu, anamanga misasa yawo ku Mara.
